T02D2503-2:4b-18: / gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas zhes bya ba

T02D2503-2:4b-22: gang gis zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2503-2:4b-23: sems can de rnams zhes bya ba ni phyi rol
T02D2503-2:4b-24: gyi rdo rje rigs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa
T02D2503-2:4b-25: rnams so // phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni ldog pa med par bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:4b-27: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las skyes so //
T02D2503-2:4b-28: de ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gnang bar gsol ba dang /
T02D2503-2:4b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba'i tshul du sems dpa' gtsug tor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:4b-30: de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal ma thag tu'o //
T02D2503-2:4b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2503-2:4b-32: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur te /
T02D2503-2:4b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor las
T02D2503-2:4b-34: byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams du ma snang bar
T02D2503-2:4b-35: byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
T02D2503-2:4b-36: zhes bya ba ni rang gi spyi bo nyid du'o
T02D2503-2:4b-37: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
T02D2503-2:4b-38: gyi tshul du 'phung nas 'khod do zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:4b-39: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
T02D2503-2:4b-40: lta bu phung por gyur nas gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-1: gzi brjid phung po de las zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-2:5a-2: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
T02D2503-2:5a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyi bor gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang ba'i tshul lta bu ni sngags gnyis pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-6: sngags de gnyis ka yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi yin no //
T02D2503-2:5a-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du
T02D2503-2:5a-8: ni nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje ste de'i thugs
T02D2503-2:5a-9: kar ro // bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su
T02D2503-2:5a-10: ni rdo rje snying po 'khor lo la brten te
T02D2503-2:5a-11: kar ro // bzhugs pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2503-2:5a-12: snam logs su ni rdo rje spyan padma la brten
T02D2503-2:5a-13: kar ro // bzhugs pa'o // te bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su ni rdo rje
T02D2503-2:5a-15: sna tshogs padma la brten te bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-16: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung na rdo rje
T02D2503-2:5a-17: rig pa mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul du
T02D2503-2:5a-18: gnas pa'o // de ltar byas na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du gsum 'jog ste /
T02D2503-2:5a-19: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2503-2:5a-20: de'i thugs kar 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02D2503-2:5a-21: zhabs kyi drung na rdo rje rig pa mchog go //
T02D2503-2:5a-22: dad pa'i sems kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i zhabs la
T02D2503-2:5a-23: 'dud pa'i phyir rdo rje rig pa mchog ces bshad
T02D2503-2:5a-24: do // rang gi mthu ston pa'i phyir rdo rje khro bo zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D2503-2:5a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni zhabs la phyag 'bul ba'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-26: yang rang gi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir snying po 'di gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:5a-27: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D2503-2:5a-28: rgyal po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bya ste /
T02D2503-2:5a-30: de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sgo'i thad ka'i dkyil
T02D2503-2:5a-31: 'khor gang yin pa de'i dbus su bri ba'i rdo
T02D2503-2:5a-32: rje bzhag la rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:5a-34: tshogs kyi bdag po rnams gnyis pa nyid du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-35: nub phyogs kyi sgo'i thad ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje nyid bzhag la /
T02D2503-2:5a-36: rdo rje gtum po la sogs pa pho nya bzhi rim bzhin bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-37: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs kyi sgo'i thad ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D2503-2:5a-38: rdo rje'i lcags kyu la sogs pa bran bzhi rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5a-39: shar gyi sgo nas brtsams te sgo bzhir ni rdo
T02D2503-2:5a-40: rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi rim bzhin du
T02D2503-2:5a-41: dgod par bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
T02D2503-2:5a-42: rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin pas
T02D2503-2:5a-43: na rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ste
T02D2503-2:5b-0: / @5b 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:5b-1: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-2: bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-4: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
T02D2503-2:5b-6: ji ltar thig gdab par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:5b-9: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
T02D2503-2:5b-11: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
T02D2503-2:5b-13: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang du bcas par zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:5b-14: da ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:5b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang //
T02D2503-2:5b-16: seng ldeng phur pa btab nas ni //
T02D2503-2:5b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:5b-18: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug la /
T02D2503-2:5b-19: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ldeng gi phur pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-20: seng ldeng phur pa btab nas ni //
T02D2503-2:5b-21: zhes bya ba nyid ni bgegs thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2503-2:5b-22: dkyil 'khor yang dag par gnas shing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir gzugs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:5b-23: srad bu gnyis rim du byas nas zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:5b-24: ni dbyibs rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir srad
T02D2503-2:5b-25: bu phur bu la dkris te nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-2:5b-26: sbyong bar bya'o // srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2503-2:5b-27: zhes bya ba ni zlum por byas nas phyogs dang mtshams rnams su srad bu bre bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-28: de yi phyi rol byung nas ni //
T02D2503-2:5b-29: zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis par ro /
T02D2503-2:5b-30: nyis 'gyur du zhes bya ba ni srad bu'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-31: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rim pa dang po'i tshad ji tsam yin pa /
T02D2503-2:5b-32: rim pa gnyis pa'i tshad kyang de tsam du bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-33: rim pa dang po'i ri mo bris pa nas bsngogs
T02D2503-2:5b-34: te phur pa la thug gi bar de lta bus
T02D2503-2:5b-35: ni srad bu nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:5b-36: de yang rim pa gsum du'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-37: zhes bya ba ni rim pa gsum pa yang rim pa dang po'i tshad tsam kho nar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-38: rim pa de gsum gyis ni dang po'i srad bu sum bltab tu byas pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:5b-39: rim pa gsum par bri ba ma smos mod kyi de yang phyis bshad par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-40: srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2503-2:5b-41: zhes gang du smos su zin kyang //
T02D2503-2:5b-42: phyogs mtshams kyi ri mo gang yin pa de chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbyibs su bya ste /
T02D2503-2:5b-43: 'di ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo chen po'i thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2503-2:5b-44: de nas srad bu bres pa der //
T02D2503-2:5b-45: dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya //
T02D2503-2:5b-47: dag pa ni yongs su bzlas pa dang /
T02D2503-2:6a-2: tshon ni dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-3: tshon dgye ba brtsam pa ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:6a-4: de'i phyir g-yon pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:6a-5: lag mthil g-yon pa na rdo rje yod pa ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-6: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i khu tshur nyid ni khu tshur chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:6a-7: des dang por tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-8: de nas phyis ci bde zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2503-2:6a-9: g-yas dang g-yon gang rung ba'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-10: de ltar thig ji ltar btab pa rnams tshon gyis
T02D2503-2:6a-11: bkang la phyag rgya rnams kyang bris te de nas
T02D2503-2:6a-13: su zhig ce na rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D2503-2:6a-14: mnyam par gzhag pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor la gnas te /
T02D2503-2:6a-15: yid kyis khang pa brtsegs ma mngon sum du dmigs
T02D2503-2:6a-16: la de'i yang rdo rje'i sgo bzhi dbye bar bya'o
T02D2503-2:6a-17: // de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i snying pos dam tshig rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-18: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di la
T02D2503-2:6a-19: ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
T02D2503-2:6a-20: yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid kyis /
T02D2503-2:6a-21: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad des stobs kyis bkug ste /
T02D2503-2:6a-22: gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi spyi bor dbang bskur ro //
T02D2503-2:6a-23: de rnams kyang gzhan dbang yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:6a-24: gdan pha gu zhes gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:6a-25: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i gdan gsungs pa bzhin du /
T02D2503-2:6a-26: de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:6a-27: gser ram yang na dngul zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:6a-28: de ni ji ltar bris pa'i lha rnams bzhag pa de dag gis dgod pa'i snying po ston te /
T02D2503-2:6a-29: snga ma ni bzlas pa'i sngags su gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:6a-30: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgod pa'i
T02D2503-2:6a-31: snying po gsungs nas de nyid kyi phyogs bzhir bcom
T02D2503-2:6a-32: ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2503-2:6a-33: rnam par rgyal bar mdzad cing bzhugs so //
T02D2503-2:6a-34: de bas na de'i spyan snga nas brtsams te /
T02D2503-2:6a-35: snying po bzhi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-36: rdo rje shugs ni shin tu grags par zad do //
T02D2503-2:6a-37: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rgal nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-2:6a-38: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga'i
T02D2503-2:6a-40: der dbus su rdo rje bzhag la rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6a-41: bri zhes smos su zin gyis kyang bzhag pa nyid
T02D2503-2:6a-42: du rig par bya ste gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-2:6b-0: bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i tshig de sngar ma gsungs pa'i @6b phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:6b-1: yang na snga ma'i thig gi rjes tshon gyis dgang
T02D2503-2:6b-2: zhes gsungs pas 'khor lo'i dbyibs su khang pa brtsegs
T02D2503-2:6b-3: ma bris te / rim pa gsum du re re zhing sgo bzhi bya la /
T02D2503-2:6b-4: der sgo dbye ba byas nas phyag rgya bri ba dang lha bri ba la bya'o /
T02D2503-2:6b-5: rim pa 'di nyid du lho sgo'i thad ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D2503-2:6b-6: rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-7: de nas rim pa gnyis pa de nyid kyi shar
T02D2503-2:6b-8: nas brtsams te sgo bzhir rdo rje glang sna la
T02D2503-2:6b-9: sogs pa thams cad rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2503-2:6b-10: bri'o // rim pa de nyid kyi nub sgo'i thad
T02D2503-2:6b-11: ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje bzhag la
T02D2503-2:6b-12: bri'o // / rdo rje gtum po la sogs pa bzhi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-13: rim pa de nyid kyi byang sgo'i thad ka'i dkyil
T02D2503-2:6b-14: 'khor du snga ma bzhin du dbus su rdo rje
T02D2503-2:6b-15: bzhag la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bran
T02D2503-2:6b-16: bzhi ltag 'og gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2503-2:6b-17: du bri'o // da ni rim pa gsum par gang
T02D2503-2:6b-18: zhig bri ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir phyi
T02D2503-2:6b-19: rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:6b-20: du bri'o // ste / dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-21: ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni lha chen po la
T02D2503-2:6b-22: sogs pa rang rang gi chung ma rnams kha dog
T02D2503-2:6b-25: rgyan ci dang ci 'dra ba de dang de lta bur bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-26: ltag 'og go rims zhes bya ba ni lha chen
T02D2503-2:6b-27: po la sogs pa lha rnams go rims ji lta
T02D2503-2:6b-28: ba bzhin du ma mo thams cad bri bar bya
T02D2503-2:6b-29: ste 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsa
T02D2503-2:6b-30: ba'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:6b-31: dang ldan par rim pa gsum par bskor te /
T02D2503-2:6b-32: bkod pa'i rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-33: rdo rje sgo ni thams cad du //
T02D2503-2:6b-34: zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams su'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-35: sgo srung rnams kyang de nyid do //
T02D2503-2:6b-36: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa de
T02D2503-2:6b-37: dag nyid de'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams su
T02D2503-2:6b-38: yang de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-39: cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-40: zhes bya ba ni 'dir slob dpon gyi las dang /
T02D2503-2:6b-41: bka' nod pa la sogs pa rnams ji skad smos pa bsdus pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:6b-42: dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2503-2:6b-43: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2503-2:6b-46: phyag rgya rnam pa gsum bcing ba dang /
T02D2503-2:6b-49: gtor ma dbul ba la sogs pa thams cad bsdu'o //
T02D2503-2:6b-50: rdo rje rnams kyi dam tshig ni phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:7a-0: de dag gi ye shes yin pas na @7a * //
T02D2503-2:7a-1: rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes so //
T02D2503-2:7a-3: de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig ces
T02D2503-2:7a-4: bya ba ni sngags sgrub pa'i phyir dam tshig bsrung
T02D2503-2:7a-5: ba la gus par bya ba ston to //
T02D2503-2:7a-6: ma bsrungs na sngags mi 'grub pa 'ba' zhig du ma zad kyi /
T02D2503-2:7a-7: mthong ba'i chos kyi nyes pa dang /
T02D2503-2:7a-8: 'jig rten phyi ma'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:7a-9: de la mthong ba'i chos kyi nyes pa ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'o //
T02D2503-2:7a-10: 'jig rten phyi ma'i nyes pa ni ngan song du 'gro ba'o //
T02D2503-2:7a-11: de ltar dam bcas pa la bkod cing nyes dmigs bstan nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:7a-12: dam tshig bsrung ba brtan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2503-2:7a-13: khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya yang bstan par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:7a-14: mna'i snying po las 'das par gyur na yang mthong
T02D2503-2:7a-15: ba'i chos kyi nyes dmigs rigs rnams zad pa dang
T02D2503-2:7a-16: / lus 'jig pa rnams bstan par bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:7a-17: rdo rje 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mna'i snying po ston to //
T02D2503-2:7a-18: dam tshig bcings pa'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2503-2:7a-19: khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i
T02D2503-2:7a-20: snying po'o // de ltar dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir mna' bsgags nas /
T02D2503-2:7a-21: de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bstan
T02D2503-2:7a-22: par bya ba'i phyir de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i
T02D2503-2:7a-23: phyag rgya snying po 'dis bcing ngo zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:7a-24: gsungs so // de bcing ba'i snying po bstan nas
T02D2503-2:7a-25: mtshan nyid bstan pa ni mthe'u chung zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:7a-27: lag pa g-yon pa mdun du kha sbubs te /
T02D2503-2:7a-28: thad dkar brkyang la de'i steng du lag pa g-yas
T02D2503-2:7a-29: pa bkan te brkyang nas bzhag ste lag pa g-yon
T02D2503-2:7a-30: pa'i mthe'u chung gis g-yas pa'i mthe bong bzung /
T02D2503-2:7a-31: g-yon pa'i mthe bos kyang g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung bzung la /
T02D2503-2:7a-33: mthe bong sbrel pa'i lag pa gnyis ni bla 'og tu 'gyur te /
T02D2503-2:7a-34: 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2503-2:7a-35: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:7a-36: dbang bskur ba 'di ni bsang gtor bya ba lta
T02D2503-2:7a-37: bu yin te gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor 'di ni
T02D2503-2:7a-38: phal chen 'jig rten gyi lhas byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D2503-2:7a-39: yin la / gang phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra la dga' ba de dag gi phyir /

T02D2503-2:22a-36: bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa na de

T02D2503-2:22b-17: dgos so // de ltar sems can rnams kyi don bya dgos pa na /
T02D2503-2:22b-18: gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir //
T02D2503-2:22b-19: bsten pas bsod rnams thob par 'gyur //
T02D2503-2:22b-20: zhes bya ba ste gzhan par te mchog go //
T02D2503-2:22b-21: chung ma ni phyag rgya chen pa'o //

T02D2503-2:22b-37: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:22b-38: las rnams thams cad byas pa yis //

T02D2503-2:23a-4: byang chub kyi sems yang dag par blang ba dang

T02D2503-2:24a-22: sems can rnams shin tu dag par mdzad pas na

T02D2503-2:24a-41: zhes bshad pa lta bu ste /

T02D2503-2:24b-12: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya'i padma gnas pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2503-2:24b-13: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi sgo nas bstan pa ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-14: 'di la yang mtshan bdun yod do //
T02D2503-2:24b-15: de ni las kyi rigs kyi sgo nas bstod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:24b-16: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:24b-18: chen po yang yin pas na sna tshogs chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-19: sna tshogs pa'i dgos pa mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D2503-2:24b-20: khyab par mdzad pas na sna tshogs chen pa //
T02D2503-2:24b-21: snang ba chen pa mnga' bas na snang ba chen pa ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-22: snang ba ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa la sgrim pa pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes so //
T02D2503-2:24b-23: dgos pa chen pa mnga' bas na dgos pa chen pa ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-24: sems can ma lus pa'i skya ba rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir te gdon mi za bar grub pa'o //
T02D2503-2:24b-25: chen pa mtshungs pa mnga' ba sna che dang mtshungs te /
T02D2503-2:24b-26: che ba ni sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2503-2:24b-27: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa
T02D2503-2:24b-28: yang de dang mtshungs par gyur pa na che dang
T02D2503-2:24b-29: mtshungs so // brtan pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na brtan pa chen pa ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-30: sems can thams cad bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:24b-31: gdug cing gtum pa rnams kun du skrag par mdzad pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-32: dpa' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:24b-33: gzi mdangs chen po dang ldan pa la dpa'i ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-2:24b-34: 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:25a-0: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas bstod par bstan pa'i phyir @25a * //
T02D2503-2:25a-1: sems can bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:25a-2: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ni sems can bsam pa ste /
T02D2503-2:25a-3: sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa de la bsam pa'i sgrar gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:25a-4: de nyid shes rab dang ye shes su yang dag
T02D2503-2:25a-5: par ldan pa ni rtogs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin
T02D2503-2:25a-6: te / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam
T02D2503-2:25a-7: par dbye bas gnas pa la ni theg pa che
T02D2503-2:25a-8: te / zhes bshad do // sems da nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'am /
T02D2503-2:25a-9: chos thams cad la dmigs pas na rnams par mi
T02D2503-2:25a-10: g-yeng ba ni rnal 'byor chen pa zhes bshad do
T02D2503-2:25a-11: // sems de nyid tshangs pa'i gzugs su sprul te /
T02D2503-2:25a-12: gnas pa la ni mes po che zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-2:25a-13: sems can rnams kyi gdul bya'i don gyi phyir bde za'i gzugs su spru pas na bde za'o //
T02D2503-2:25a-14: sham ni bde ba la bya ba de byed pa'i gang tshul mnga' bas na bde byed de /
T02D2503-2:25a-15: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:25a-16: dag pa sgra ni sems de nyid la bya bar
T02D2503-2:25a-17: bshad de dag pa'i sgra'i don yin pas na dag
T02D2503-2:25a-18: pa'i don te / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par gro ba'i phir ro //
T02D2503-2:25a-19: padmo rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni padma kha bye ba zhes bya ba ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:25a-20: sems de nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i
T02D2503-2:25a-21: sgrib pa'i gnyid gnyis dang bral bas na padma rgyas
T02D2503-2:25a-22: pa lta bu yin pas na sangs rgyas padma zhes
T02D2503-2:25a-23: bya'o // de ltar na tshig su bcad pa 'di
T02D2503-2:25a-24: ni mtshan brgya tsa brgyad kyis bsod pa yin no
T02D2503-2:25a-25: bya'o // // da ni bshad chos rnams kyi sgo
T02D2503-2:25a-26: nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir chos de nyid don
T02D2503-2:25a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:25a-28: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te /
T02D2503-2:25a-29: gzung la sogs pa ste chos de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni chos de nyid do //
T02D2503-2:25a-30: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi don mnga' bas na chos de nyid don to //
T02D2503-2:25a-31: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas na dam pa'i chos so //
T02D2503-2:25a-32: yang na chos bzang po yin pas nad ma pa'i chos so //
T02D2503-2:25a-33: dag pa yang yin la chos kyang yin pas na
T02D2503-2:25a-34: dag pa'i chos te thog ma dang bar dang tha
T02D2503-2:25a-36: chos bzang po mdzad pas na chos rab byed de
T02D2503-2:25a-37: rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro
T02D2503-2:25a-38: // chos kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:25b-0: theg @25b pa chen pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:25b-1: chos bzang po yin pas na chos bzang po ste /
T02D2503-2:25b-2: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i zag pa med pa'o //
T02D2503-2:25b-3: de las kyang theg pa chen po'i chos ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
T02D2503-2:25b-5: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la skal ba ji lta
T02D2503-2:25b-6: ba bzhin du 'jug par mdzad pas na chos kyi
T02D2503-2:25b-7: 'khor lo'o // 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:25b-8: da ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:25b-9: sangs rgyas sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:25b-10: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems dpa' yin pas na sangs rgyas sems pa'o //
T02D2503-2:25b-11: sems dpa' bzang pa yin pas na sems bzang ste /
T02D2503-2:25b-12: byang chub sems pa'i rnams so //
T02D2503-2:25b-13: de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na sems bzang mchog go //
T02D2503-2:25b-14: 'od dpag tu med pas yongs su bzung ba nyid
T02D2503-2:25b-15: kyis na chos nyid rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos
T02D2503-2:25b-16: kyi sems dpa'o // sems dpa' bzang po yin pas na sems mchog ste /
T02D2503-2:25b-17: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:25b-18: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsam pa la bya bar bshad la /
T02D2503-2:25b-19: de lta bu'i bsam pa 'dzin pas na sems chog 'dzin ces bshad do //
T02D2503-2:25b-20: sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pas na sems dpa'i dam pa ste /
T02D2503-2:25b-21: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis mchog tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:25b-22: shin tu yang can rnams mkhyen pas na sems mchog shes so //
T02D2503-2:25b-23: yang na sems dpa' mchog rnams mkhyen pas na sems pa'i mchog shes so //
T02D2503-2:25b-24: 'khor bar chags pas na sems can te /
T02D2503-2:25b-26: de rnams la rje su thugs brtse bas 'jigs pa
T02D2503-2:25b-27: chen po brgyad las bskyab par bya ba'i phyir chags
T02D2503-2:25b-29: nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na sems can dpa' zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-2:25b-30: tshig su bcad pa 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:25b-31: da ni phyag rgya chen pa'i sgo nas bstod pa
T02D2503-2:25b-32: bstan pa'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya
T02D2503-2:25b-33: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:26a-0: @26a * // spyan ras gzigs kyis 'tsho bas na na spyan ras gzigs so //
T02D2503-2:26a-1: spyan ras gzigs pa la mnga' brnyes pas na spyan ras gzigs dbang ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-2: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos kyi de kho na
T02D2503-2:26a-3: nyid thugs su chud pa la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir
T02D2503-2:26a-4: ro // mgon po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D2503-2:26a-5: de rnams kyi sras kyi mchog yin pas na mgon po mchog go //
T02D2503-2:26a-6: yang na mgon po ni phongs pa rnams las skyob par byed pa ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-7: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad kyi zin pa rnams las
T02D2503-2:26a-8: yongs su skyob par mdzad pas na mgon po rnams
T02D2503-2:26a-9: kyi mchog tu gyur pas na mgon po'i mchog go
T02D2503-2:26a-10: // mgon po yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na mgon po chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-11: gdul bya'i don gyi bya ba chen po la brtson par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:26a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khyad par du rnam par gzigs pas na rnam gzigs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:26a-13: ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu yang 'phel bar gyur bas na snang ba'o //
T02D2503-2:26a-14: sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi bdag nyid can yin pas na 'jig rten no //
T02D2503-2:26a-15: 'jig rten rnams kyi don mdzad pas na 'jig rten don to //
T02D2503-2:26a-16: 'jig rten mgon khyod ces bya ba ni mtshan te /
T02D2503-2:26a-17: de bas na mtshan des mtshon par byas te bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:26a-18: tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di ni mtshan brgyad kyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:26a-19: da ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas bstod pa'i
T02D2503-2:26a-20: phyir 'jig rten yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2503-2:26a-21: pa gsungs te / 'jig rten du mi 'gyur bas na yi ge ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-22: rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:26a-23: yang na mi 'gyur bas na yi ge ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-24: gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni ngo bo nyid las mi 'gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:26a-25: yi ge yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na yi ge chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:26a-26: chos thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:26a-27: 'jig rten na yi ge ste mi 'gyur bar 'dod
T02D2503-2:26a-28: pa gang ci yang rung ba rtag par 'dod pa
T02D2503-2:26a-29: de rnams kyi mchog ste dam pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2503-2:26a-30: don to // chos nyid kyi mchog yin pa'i mi
T02D2503-2:26a-31: 'gyur ba gang gis mtshungs par gyur bas yi ge
T02D2503-2:26a-32: ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste de dang mtshungs pa
T02D2503-2:26a-33: gang yin pa de ni yi ge 'dra'o //
T02D2503-2:26b-0: mi 'gyur ba rnams kyi yang mi 'gyur pa @26b yin pas yi ge'i yi ge ste /
T02D2503-2:26b-1: mi 'gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:26b-2: ye shes las sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2503-2:26b-3: de rnams kyi chos kyi sku la lhag pa'i spyod
T02D2503-2:26b-4: par mdzad pas mi 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur ba
T02D2503-2:26b-6: spyan lnga dang ldan pas na thams cad spyan te /
T02D2503-2:26b-10: shes rab dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pa'i phyir thams cad spyan no //
T02D2503-2:26b-11: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2503-2:26b-12: las 'byung ba'i yi ge'i 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi ngo
T02D2503-2:26b-13: bo nyid du gyur pas na /
T02D2503-2:26b-16: 'dir yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:26b-17: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgo nas tshigs
T02D2503-2:26b-18: su bcad pa 'dis bstod pa'i phyir phyag na padmo
T02D2503-2:26b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:26b-20: phyag na mtshan par gyur pa'i padma mnga' bas na phyag na padmo'o //
T02D2503-2:26b-21: phyag chen po mnga' bas na phyag chen po ste
T02D2503-2:26b-22: gdul bya rnams kyi dgos pa yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2503-2:26b-23: bya ba'i phyir khyab bdag nyid du gyur par ston
T02D2503-2:26b-24: pa'i tshe / phyag gi mthil gyis 'jig rten gyi
T02D2503-2:26b-25: khams grangs med pa 'gebs par mdzad pa'i phyir phyag
T02D2503-2:26b-26: pa'i tshe / chen po'o // 'jigs pa chen po
T02D2503-2:26b-27: brgyad kyis skrag par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs
T02D2503-2:26b-28: pa spyin pa'i phyag gis dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas
T02D2503-2:26b-30: mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gis yi dags rnams kyi khar
T02D2503-2:26b-31: bdun rtsi la sogs pa stsol bar mdzad pas na
T02D2503-2:26b-32: spyin pa po'o // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'phags
T02D2503-2:26b-33: ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T02D2503-2:26b-34: sogs pa mdo sde rnams yang dag par bsdus pa
T02D2503-2:26b-35: la 'jug par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas chos so
T02D2503-2:26b-36: spyin pa po'o // // 'di la sangs rgyas chen po mnga' bas na sangs rgyas chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:26b-37: dbu la sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa 'jog par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2503-2:26b-38: sangs rgyas kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa yin pas na sangs rgyas che'o //
T02D2503-2:26b-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi skur bzhugs pas na sangs rgyas bdag nyid do //
T02D2503-2:26b-40: 'dir yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:26b-41: da ni gzugs kyi sku'i sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir
T02D2503-2:26b-42: sangs rgyas gzugs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:27a-1: rnams kyi gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs te //
T02D2503-2:27a-2: sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:27a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pas bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:27a-4: de nyid kyis khams thams cad du khyab par phyir na gzugs chen po'o //
T02D2503-2:27a-5: phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pas nas rdo rje'i gzugs so //
T02D2503-2:27a-6: gzugs bzang po 'dzin par mdzad pas na gzugs bzang 'chang ngo //
T02D2503-2:27a-7: chos rnams kyi snang ba mdzad pas na chos kyi snang ba ste snang ba ye shes la bya'o //
T02D2503-2:27a-8: gang la gzi brjid bzang po mnga' ba de ni gzi brjid do //
T02D2503-2:27a-9: de rnams kyi mchog ni rdo rje nyi ma yin la //
T02D2503-2:27a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:27a-11: 'jig rten rnams la phyin ci ma log pa'i chos
T02D2503-2:27a-12: ston pas snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten snang
T02D2503-2:27a-13: ba'o // 'dir yang mtshan bdun po nyid kyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:27a-14: da ni rigs kyi sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir padmo'i dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:27a-15: padma'o rigs kyi dpal yin pas na padmo'i dpal te /
T02D2503-2:27a-16: chu'i dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:27a-17: de'i mgon po yin pas na padmo'i dpal gyi mgon po'o //
T02D2503-2:27a-18: mgon po yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na mgon po mchog ste /
T02D2503-2:27a-19: rigs pa'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir mgon po mchog go //
T02D2503-2:27a-20: chos rnams kyi dpal yin pas na chos dpal ste lha mo dbyangs can no //
T02D2503-2:27a-21: de'i mgon po ni bdag por gyur pa ste des na chos dpal mgon po'o //
T02D2503-2:27a-22: 'di la mgon po mnga' bas na mgon ldan te /
T02D2503-2:27a-23: 'od dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:27a-24: tshangs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D2503-2:27a-25: ba'i don te 'di'i mgon po mnga' bas na tshangs
T02D2503-2:27a-26: pa'i mgon po'o // tshangs pa yang yin la chen
T02D2503-2:27a-27: po yang yin pas na tshangs pa chen po ste
T02D2503-2:27a-28: pa'i mgon po'o // / gdul bya rnams kyi dbang
T02D2503-2:27a-29: gis tshangs pa'i gzugs su sprul pa mdzad pas na
T02D2503-2:27a-31: tshangs pa'i sras yin pas na tshangs sras te sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:27a-32: 'dir yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:27a-33: da ni ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir
T02D2503-2:27a-34: snang ba'i snang mchog nges bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:27a-35: gsungs te / mar med dang 'dra bas na snang ba snye /
T02D2503-2:27b-0: @27b phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i mun bsel bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:27b-1: 'jig rten na nor bu la sogs pa snang ba
T02D2503-2:27b-2: gang yin pa de rnams ni phyi rol gyi mun
T02D2503-2:27b-3: pa sel bar byed pa yin par grags pa tsam
T02D2503-2:27b-4: du zad kyi // 'dis ni phyi dang nang gi
T02D2503-2:27b-5: mun pa thams cad sel bas na snang mchog go
T02D2503-2:27b-6: du zad kyi // // snang ba yang yin la gtso bo yang yin pas na snang gtso ste /
T02D2503-2:27b-7: nyon mongs pa'i sgra rnams 'joms pas so //
T02D2503-2:27b-8: de yang ye shes kyi snang ba ni myong mongs
T02D2503-2:27b-9: pa thams cad kyi gnyer por gyur pa yin pa'i
T02D2503-2:27b-10: phyir // ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D2503-2:27b-11: mar me ltar snang ba mnga' bas na snang gsal te /
T02D2503-2:27b-12: 'od zer 'gyed pas phyi'i mun pa sel bar chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:27b-13: rab tu snang ba yin pas shin tu snang ba
T02D2503-2:27b-14: po ste yang dag pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro
T02D2503-2:27b-15: // snang ba ni padma'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de las gzhan pa rnams te /
T02D2503-2:27b-16: de rnams kyi mgon po yin pas na snang ba'i mgon po'o ;
T02D2503-2:27b-17: / snang ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na snang ba chen po ste /
T02D2503-2:27b-18: khams gsum po snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:27b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi snang ba yin pas na sangs rgyas snang ba ste /
T02D2503-2:27b-20: des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang
T02D2503-2:27b-21: rjes su mthun par rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir ro
T02D2503-2:27b-22: // 'dis ni mtshan brgyad kyis bstod pa yin no //

T02D2503-2:37a-27: pa'i chags pa ste chags pa des chags pa'i phyir

T02D2503-2:37b-0: @37b bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de sprul pa yin no //

T02D2503-2:42b-8: ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje thal mo bcings
T02D2503-2:42b-9: pa zhes bya'o // pa'i tshul bya'o // zhes bya
T02D2503-2:42b-10: ste / phyag rgya'o // sbyar la // pa'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-11: g-yon dang g-yas nas zhes bya ba ni g-yas g-yon
T02D2503-2:42b-12: gyi ngos gnyis su rdo rje thal mo de nyid
T02D2503-2:42b-13: 'gying ba dang bcas par bskor ba'i tshul du byas
T02D2503-2:42b-15: de nas yang bskor zhing drangs la ngos gang yang
T02D2503-2:42b-16: rung ba nas rdo rje thal mo de dbab par
T02D2503-2:42b-17: bya'o // de nas yang ngos gzhan nas slar bteg
T02D2503-2:42b-18: la ngos gcig tu dbab par bya zhing de bzhin
T02D2503-2:42b-19: du spyi bo'i bar du drang bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-20: 'gying bcas ni sgeg pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-21: 'di ni gar thabs padmo can zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:42b-22: rdo rje las kyi gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-23: de bzhin zhes bya ba 'dis ni rdo rje thal mo ma bkrol bar ston to //
T02D2503-2:42b-24: rtse mo kha bye ba zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D2503-2:42b-25: rje thal mo ma bkrol ba nyid du sor mo
T02D2503-2:42b-26: thams cad kyi rtse mo phral na sor mo thams
T02D2503-2:42b-27: cad kha bye ba yin no //
T02D2503-2:42b-28: de lta bu'i rdo rje thal mo de bskor ba ni lag pa'i mthil gnyis rgyab sbrang pa'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-29: de nas snying gar bzhag na padmos brtan par byed
T02D2503-2:42b-30: pa ste go cha'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2503-2:42b-31: ba'i don to // gsang ba'i gnod sbyin zhes bya
T02D2503-2:42b-32: ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi gsang
T02D2503-2:42b-33: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas
T02D2503-2:42b-34: su rdo rje thal mo'i rnam pas phyag rgya'i sbyor
T02D2503-2:42b-35: ba byas pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:42b-36: gnod sbyin gyi tshul du zhes bya ba de bzhin
T02D2503-2:42b-37: du byas la brkyang nas rdo rje thal mo snyim
T02D2503-2:42b-38: pa'i tshul du byas pa khar bzhag na padmo gnod
T02D2503-2:42b-40: gsang ba'i gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya de yang rdo
T02D2503-2:42b-41: rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rang gi
T02D2503-2:42b-42: mthe bo'i drung du bzhag la mthe bo gnyis kyang
T02D2503-2:42b-44: 'di ni gsang ba'i gnod sbyin gyi tshul de 'di yin no //
T02D2503-2:42b-45: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba la sog pa
T02D2503-2:42b-46: ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya las mdzub
T02D2503-2:42b-47: mo gnyis ji ltar gnas pa gung mo gnyis kyang
T02D2503-2:42b-49: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-50: 'di rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi padmo'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-2:42b-51: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-2:42b-52: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings
T02D2503-2:42b-53: kyi dkyil 'khor chen por sgeg mo la sogs pa'i
T02D2503-2:42b-54: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe
T02D2503-2:43a-1: drang por sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2503-2:43a-2: 'di ni rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul de las 'dir
T02D2503-2:43a-3: rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis bsnyams la
T02D2503-2:43a-4: / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:43a-5: de ltar na rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:43a-6: bzhi po rnams kyi ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe
T02D2503-2:43a-7: bo brkyang ba las phyag rgyar 'gyur gyi /
T02D2503-2:43a-8: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rdo rje bsdams pa kho na las te /
T02D2503-2:43a-9: rdo rje bsdams pa thur du gtugs //
T02D2503-2:43a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:43a-11: de skad gsungs pa las ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2503-2:43a-12: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi char yang
T02D2503-2:43a-13: der rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bo brkyang ba las
T02D2503-2:43a-15: de bzhin du 'dir sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi
T02D2503-2:43a-16: char gyi yang rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bo bsnyams
T02D2503-2:43a-17: pa las dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams su sbyar
T02D2503-2:43a-18: bar bya'o // bdug pa la sogs pa ni rdo
T02D2503-2:43a-19: rje thal mo phye ba las yin par shes par
T02D2503-2:43a-20: bar bya'o // bya ste / 'di dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul te /
T02D2503-2:43a-21: mchod pa'i mchog lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-2:43a-22: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-2:43a-23: dam tshig kyang de yin la mchog kyang de yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:43a-24: da ni sgo ba rnams kyi phyag rgya ston te /
T02D2503-2:43a-25: de la re zhig sgo dang por ni bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin padma lcags kyu yin la /
T02D2503-2:43a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02D2503-2:43a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
T02D2503-2:43a-29: rdo rje bsdams pa dam du bcings la /
T02D2503-2:43a-30: mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas //
T02D2503-2:43a-31: zhes bya ba la mnyam par sbyar bas na mnyam
T02D2503-2:43a-32: par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar bya'o zhes
T02D2503-2:43a-34: bkug pa zhes bya ba la bkug pa ni tshigs par ma bcag pa'o //
T02D2503-2:43a-35: rtse mo sbyar ba'i zhes bya ba ni rtse mo dgug pa'o //
T02D2503-2:43a-36: 'di ni rta gdong lta bu yin te /
T02D2503-2:43a-37: de la mthe bo gnyis ni rna bar 'gyur la /
T02D2503-2:43a-38: mthe'u chung zur du brkyang ba gnyis ni rje dar du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:43a-39: gang gis phyag rgya 'di'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2503-2:43a-40: bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su
T02D2503-2:43a-41: bskyed la ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir
T02D2503-2:43a-42: spyi bor rta gdong gi phyag rgya rmi ga pa
T02D2503-2:43a-43: gnyis 'phyag ste byung ba bzhag cing /
T02D2503-2:43a-44: zhal rnam par 'gyur ba mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2503-2:43b-0: zhal gdangs shing bskal pa'i me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du @43b 'khrugs pa /
T02D2503-2:43b-1: 'jig rten gsum po ri bo rnams dang bcas pa
T02D2503-2:43b-2: dang rgya mtshor bcas pa za bzhin pa lta bur
T02D2503-2:43b-4: padmo thal mo mnyam sbyar la //
T02D2503-2:43b-5: zhes bya ba ni padma kha ma bye ba lta
T02D2503-2:43b-6: bu'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis mdud par
T02D2503-2:43b-7: mdud pa ni zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis kyi
T02D2503-2:43b-8: gdong phan tshun du sprad de mdud pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2503-2:43b-9: padmo kha ma bye ba lta bur bya ste /
T02D2503-2:43b-10: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-11: da ni padmo'i lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bstan par
T02D2503-2:43b-12: bya ba'i phyir mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog ces bya ba
T02D2503-2:43b-13: gsungs te / padmo kha ma bye ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:43b-14: de nyid las mthe bo gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2503-2:43b-15: gcig la gcig 'khyud par sbrel la lcags sgrog tu
T02D2503-2:43b-16: bya ba 'di ni padmo'i lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:43b-17: gsungs te / ste / ma rungs pa thams cad ba cing ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-18: padmo'i thal mo mnyam byas la //
T02D2503-2:43b-19: zhes bya ba ni padmo kham bye ba'i thal mo bya ba'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-20: mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du btsir //
T02D2503-2:43b-21: zhes bya ba ni srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis
T02D2503-2:43b-22: kyi bar du mthe bo'i lto btsir bar bya ba'i
T02D2503-2:43b-23: don te / 'di ni padma dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-24: padmo'i khu tshur 'di bshad zin te /
T02D2503-2:43b-25: de gnyis su byas la rdo rje dbyings las pa
T02D2503-2:43b-26: spyings bcas gsor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2503-2:43b-27: tshul gyi phyag rgya rnams bstan par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-28: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcing bar bya ba'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rigs
T02D2503-2:43b-30: kyi dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2503-2:43b-31: thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D2503-2:43b-32: dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho gar yongs brtags pa yin pas na rtogs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-33: rtog pa gzhan rnams las shin tu khyad par du
T02D2503-2:43b-34: 'phags pa'i phyir rgyal po yang yin la chen po
T02D2503-2:43b-35: yang yin pas na rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
T02D2503-2:43b-36: ste / de las 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la dbang du byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2503-2:43b-37: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa
T02D2503-2:43b-38: ko sa la'i rgyan las 'gro ba thams cad 'dul
T02D2503-2:43b-41: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2503-2:43b-42: pas padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ston to
T02D2503-2:43b-43: // de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la
T02D2503-2:43b-44: ste phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes thogs
T02D2503-2:44a-2: yang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2503-2:44a-3: su rdo rje gsungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o
T02D2503-2:44a-4: // bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2503-2:44a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02D2503-2:44a-6: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nyid der byang chub sems
T02D2503-2:44a-7: dpa'i gzugs su sbul par mdzad pas de dag thams
T02D2503-2:44a-8: cad la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-2:44a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rigs
T02D2503-2:44a-10: kyi gzungs ma yin pas na chos kyi gzungs te
T02D2503-2:44a-11: / gzungs zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi gzungs yin par gzung la /
T02D2503-2:44a-12: de dag gi dam tshig ni phyag rgya dang lha dang sngags dang /
T02D2503-2:44a-13: rigs pa dang snying po rnams ni dam tshig ces bya bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:44a-14: de lta bu'i khyad par gyi dam tshig 'di /
T02D2503-2:44a-15: bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byung //
T02D2503-2:44a-16: zhes padma'i bsgom pa las des par skyes pa'i bsam
T02D2503-2:44a-17: pa'i khyad par de byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i
T02D2503-2:44a-18: phyir ting nge 'dzin gang padmo la dmigs pa'i ting
T02D2503-2:44a-19: nge 'dzin de la ni don dang mthun pa'i ming
T02D2503-2:44a-20: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-2:44a-21: chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi
T02D2503-2:44a-22: rlabs padma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya
T02D2503-2:44a-23: ste / de bas na ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D2503-2:44a-24: nyid kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa dam pa 'og nas bshad pa 'di gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:44a-25: ji lta bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-2:44a-26: byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i rig pa dam pa
T02D2503-2:44a-28: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i
T02D2503-2:44a-29: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor los sgyur
T02D2503-2:44a-30: ba bzhis kyang rang rang gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis
T02D2503-2:44a-32: dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rig pa rnams gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:44a-33: 'dir 'khor los sgyur ba gzhan la'ang phyag na rdo rje'i sgrar gsungs mod kyi /
T02D2503-2:44a-34: 'on kyang 'gro ba 'dul ba de nyid kyi gzugs yin par ba lta'o //
T02D2503-2:44a-35: da ni phyag na rdo rje'i sgrar gsungs pa de
T02D2503-2:44a-36: nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug yin par bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2503-2:44a-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
T02D2503-2:44b-0: pos zhes bya ba gsungs @44b pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:44b-1: rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
T02D2503-2:44b-2: 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi rigs
T02D2503-2:44b-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dam tshig 'dzin du
T02D2503-2:44b-5: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin nga aa dam tshig gi
T02D2503-2:44b-6: phyag rgya'o // de'i dkyil 'khor yin pas na rang
T02D2503-2:44b-7: gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-2:44b-8: te dkyil 'khor ni snying po la bya ste /
T02D2503-2:44b-9: mar gyi snying po bzhin no //
T02D2503-2:44b-10: de 'dzin par byed pas na dkyil 'khor te manda
T02D2503-2:44b-11: ni snying po la ni a'a da na ste len
T02D2503-2:44b-12: par byed pa'o // sems can rnams kyi snying po ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2503-2:44b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2503-2:44b-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni snying po yin te /
T02D2503-2:44b-15: snying po de len pa la 'dzud pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:44b-16: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor de gsungs pa ni bshad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:44b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:44b-19: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs te dkyil 'khor chen po'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2503-2:44b-20: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa'i
T02D2503-2:44b-21: don gyi bya ba de ma bstan na 'byung bar
T02D2503-2:44b-22: mi 'gyur na / de'i phyir rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02D2503-2:44b-24: yang dag cing phyin ci ma log par rab tu phye zhing so sor gses te /
T02D2503-2:44b-25: bstan par bya zhing bshad par bya ba yin pas na rab tu bshad bya ba'o //
T02D2503-2:44b-27: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:44b-28: ji lta bu zhe na dam pa zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:44b-29: ste don gyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2503-2:44b-31: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la ste rdo rje dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:44b-32: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:44b-33: padmo'i gsang bzhes bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:44b-34: padma'i rigs kyi gsang ba yin pas na padmo'i gsang ba ste /
T02D2503-2:44b-36: dkyil 'khor de ji ltar thig gdab par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:44b-37: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2503-2:44b-39: dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2503-2:44b-40: dkyil 'khor chen po de sbyor ba gang dang /
T02D2503-2:44b-41: ting nge 'dzin gang dang dbyibs gang gis theg 'debs par byed pa'i sbyong ba de nyid dang /
T02D2503-2:44b-42: ting nge 'dzin de nyid dang dbyibs de nyid kyis 'dir yang thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-0: de zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor @45a * //
T02D2503-2:45a-2: dbus zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad ki gnas su'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-3: padmo bzang po ni padma mchog ste padmo'i gtso bo'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri //
T02D2503-2:45a-5: zhes bya ba ni mchod rten la legs par zhugs par bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:45a-6: mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa //
T02D2503-2:45a-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2503-2:45a-9: de'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo'i'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-10: phyogs rnams thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi char du'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-11: dam tshig rnams ni phyag rgya thams cad do //
T02D2503-2:45a-12: de rnams kyi mchog ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum rnams so //
T02D2503-2:45a-13: lhag ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-14: rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par //
T02D2503-2:45a-15: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa rnams kyis dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:45a-16: chos kyi rdo rje la sogs pa //
T02D2503-2:45a-17: zhes bya ba la chos kyi rdo rje ma zhes smos pas /
T02D2503-2:45a-18: sems dpa' rdo rje nyid yin par ston par shes par bya ste /
T02D2503-2:45a-19: 'di nyid dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-20: de la zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor der ro //
T02D2503-2:45a-21: de dag ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya de rnams kyi'o //
T02D2503-2:45a-22: phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:45a-23: ni phyag rgya rnams kyi dgod pa'i snying po la
T02D2503-2:45a-25: rig pa de dag nyid las phyag rgya rnams 'byung bas tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:45a-26: sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig pa bstan zin nas /
T02D2503-2:45a-27: sna tshogs gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2503-2:45a-28: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig
T02D2503-2:45a-29: pa ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:45a-30: rdo rje shugs ni dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i sngags te /
T02D2503-2:45a-31: srad bu la sogs pa las rgal kyang ri mo'am

T02D2503-2:63a-3: po che gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i

T02D2503-2:63a-5: sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na
T02D2503-2:63a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
T02D2503-2:63a-7: rin chen ni dngos su bshad pa 'di nyid do //
T02D2503-2:63a-8: thugs rin po che las byung ba nyid kyis rigs
T02D2503-2:63a-9: rin po che rnams shin tu khyad par du 'phags
T02D2503-2:63a-10: pas na rin chen dam pa'o //
T02D2503-2:63a-11: nam mkha' chen po las yang dag par 'khrungs pas na nam mkha' che'o //
T02D2503-2:63a-12: spro ba'i tshe nam mkha' dang lhan cig mnyam par mdzad pas na nam mkha' mnyam mo //
T02D2503-2:63a-13: rgyan du gyur par mdzad pas na rgyan te aa
T02D2503-2:63a-14: lam ni rgyan gyi don la 'jug pa yin pa'i
T02D2503-2:63a-15: phyir ro // mdzes pa chen por mdzad pas na mdzes pa che'o //
T02D2503-2:63a-16: mdzes pa rnams skye ba'i gnas su gyur pas na mdzes pa'i 'byung gnas so //
T02D2503-2:63a-17: mdzes pa rnams kyi nang na yang mdzes par mdzad bas na rab mdzes mdzad do //
T02D2503-2:63a-18: don thams cad sbyin pa por gyur pas na don kun no //
T02D2503-2:63a-19: dri ma rnams dang bral bas na dag pa'o //
T02D2503-2:63a-20: dag pa'i don rnams rab tu stsol bar mdzad pas na dag pa'i don to //
T02D2503-2:63a-21: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sbyin spyod do //
T02D2503-2:63a-22: byang chub kyi sems kyi chos rin po che'i ngo bo yin pas na chos rin chen no //
T02D2503-2:63a-23: rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas rnams te de
T02D2503-2:63a-24: rnams kyi dpral bar bzhugs pas na rnam dag mchog

T02D2503-2:63a-26: 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na dge 'dun
T02D2503-2:63a-27: go // rin chen no // shin tu rnam par
T02D2503-2:63a-28: dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2503-2:63a-29: pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:63a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur bas chen po

T02D2503-2:63b-1: byed pa po'i sgo nas sbyin mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-2:63b-2: sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mdzad pas na sems can don to //

T02D2503-2:63b-4: dngos po thams cad rnam par rtog pa la rag

T02D2503-2:63b-8: ched kar don du gnyer ba yin pas na don to //

T02D2503-2:63b-15: phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston par mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:63b-16: sems dpa' dpag tu med pas na sems dpa' che'o ;
T02D2503-2:63b-17: / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phra rab las byung bas na sangs rgyas kun no //
T02D2503-2:63b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i rin
T02D2503-2:63b-19: po che chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i don du brtags

T02D2503-2:63b-23: rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgo nas bstod pas na bzhad chen no //

T02D2503-2:63b-33: 'jig rten rab mchog ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi rab ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /

T02D2503-2:64a-1: pa rnams la yang snang bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten nyi ma'o //
T02D2503-2:64a-2: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan brgyad yod do //

T02D2503-2:64a-9: phyogs skyong ba khyab par mdzad pas na snang ba che'o //
T02D2503-2:64a-10: 'jig rten thams cad du grags par mdzad bas na rin chen grags pa'o //
T02D2503-2:64a-11: rin po che'i phung po'i nang na bzhugs pas na rin chen phung po ste /

T02D2503-2:64a-15: rdo rje nor bus mtshan pas na rdo rje nor bu'o //
T02D2503-2:64a-16: yon tan rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas na yon tan no //
T02D2503-2:64a-17: rin po che thams cad skye ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na rin chen 'byung ba'o //
T02D2503-2:64a-18: nyid kyi 'od kyis yongs su bskor bas na sku rab 'bar ro //
T02D2503-2:64a-19: rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na rin chen kun no //
T02D2503-2:64a-20: 'di la ni mtshan brgyad yod do //
T02D2503-2:64a-21: 'di la bdag nyid chen po mnga' zhing bdag nyid che ba dang ldan pas na che nyid do //
T02D2503-2:64a-22: dbul po rnams kyis 'ju sar gyur pas na shing ngo //
T02D2503-2:64a-23: rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na rin chen dbang ngo /

T02D2503-2:64a-26: sgrub par mdzad pas na bsam pa thams cad legs
T02D2503-2:64a-27: par brnyes pa'o // don gcig don du gnyer na

T02D2503-2:64a-30: 'di la ni mtshan drug ste 'das ma thag pa'i lhag ma rnams bdun du 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:64a-31: 'od zer gsal ba'i mchog mnga' bas na 'od mchog go //
T02D2503-2:64a-32: thugs rin po ches thams cad du khyab pas na khyab pa'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-0: dngos po thams cad thugs rin po che 'dir 'dus @64b pas na bdag nyid kun no //
T02D2503-2:64b-1: mchog stsol bar mdzad pas na mchog rab sbyin no //
T02D2503-2:64b-2: mchog chen po mnga' bas na mchog che ba'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-3: 'di yod pa las 'bru thams cad phun sum tshogs
T02D2503-2:64b-4: par 'gyur bas na phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D2503-2:64b-5: do // 'di yod pa las khyad par du 'byor bar gyur pas na 'byor pa'o ;
T02D2503-2:64b-6: / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i snying po mnga' bas na rdo rje'i snying po'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-7: 'di la ni mtshan brgyad de de ltar na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad du shes par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-8: da ni ming brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pas mtshan brgya rtsa phan yon te /
T02D2503-2:64b-9: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:64b-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob //

T02D2503-2:64b-12: bas bstod na sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir dbang bskur

T02D2503-2:64b-14: sdig med ces pa ni bstod pas sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:64b-15: rin chen khyod ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-16: gsol ba ni zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur sngon du 'gro ba'i bstod pas mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-17: nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod //
T02D2503-2:64b-18: ces bya ba ni nor yang dag par bsags pa'i
T02D2503-2:64b-19: rgyur gyur pas na rin po che'i rigs nyid la
T02D2503-2:64b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mchog ;
T02D2503-2:64b-22: / ces bya ba la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D2503-2:64b-23: dbang bskur ba'i mchog ni rdo rje rin chen te
T02D2503-2:64b-24: / de rigs 'dir gtso bo yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-25: rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzad //
T02D2503-2:64b-26: ces bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs shes par bya ba'i don to //

T02D2503-2:64b-28: dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni bdag por bskur ba'i dam tshig gi snying po'o //
T02D2503-2:64b-29: da ni 'di man chad bdag po lnga'i rang gi
T02D2503-2:64b-30: dkyil 'khor lnga byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'i rig
T02D2503-2:64b-31: pa dam pa lnga yin bar shes par bya ste

T02D2503-2:64b-33: gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces
T02D2503-2:64b-34: bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rnam par
T02D2503-2:64b-35: snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi nor bu'i dam tshig
T02D2503-2:64b-36: / go // gnyis pa la rang gi rigs 'byung
T02D2503-2:64b-37: bzhes gsungs pa ni rang gi rigs te rin po
T02D2503-2:64b-38: che'i rigs 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:65a-0: gsum par rang gi rig pa dam pa zhes gsungs pa ni rang gi dkyil 'khor byin @65a * //
T02D2503-2:65a-1: gyis rlob par byed pa'i rig pa dam pa yin pas na rang gi rig pa dam pa'o //
T02D2503-2:65a-2: bzhi par yang rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa
T02D2503-2:65a-3: dam pa zhes gsungs pa ni rang gi rigs 'byung
T02D2503-2:65a-4: ba yang 'di yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o
T02D2503-2:65a-5: // lnga par yang rang gi rig pa dam pa
T02D2503-2:65a-6: ni zhes gsung pa ni rang gi rig sa 'byung
T02D2503-2:65a-7: // ba'i phyir ro // de nas byang chub sems
T02D2503-2:65a-8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
T02D2503-2:65a-9: po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin
T02D2503-2:65a-10: gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba rin po
T02D2503-2:65a-11: che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba
T02D2503-2:65a-12: ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba'i rin
T02D2503-2:65a-13: po che la dmigs pas na ring nge 'dzin 'di
T02D2503-2:65a-15: de nas snyoms bar zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya
T02D2503-2:65a-16: ba ni skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe zhes
T02D2503-2:65a-18: rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu'i 'od
T02D2503-2:65a-19: zer rnams byung nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rjes
T02D2503-2:65a-20: mtshan pa'i nor bu rin po che ste de lta
T02D2503-2:65a-22: / de dag gis zhes bya ba ni 'od zer rnams kyis so //
T02D2503-2:65a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams thams can snang bar byas te
T02D2503-2:65a-24: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2503-2:65a-25: khyab pa'o // sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-2:65a-26: pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:65a-27: la sems can thams cad ni 'jig rten pa'i lha
T02D2503-2:65a-29: de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du
T02D2503-2:65a-30: dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-2:65a-31: dbang bskur ba ste des dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2503-2:65a-32: yang gcig tu gyur te zhes bya ba ni spros
T02D2503-2:65a-33: par rnams bsdu ba byas pas slar 'dus te gcig
T02D2503-2:65a-34: tu gyur pa'o // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
T02D2503-2:65a-35: dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs su zhugs
T02D2503-2:65a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams sprul par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:65a-38: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la bya ste 'od zer zhugs pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D2503-2:65a-39: nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2503-2:65a-40: na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni gang
T02D2503-2:65a-41: sngar de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol

T02D2503-2:65a-43: pa de'i thugs las sprul pa'i sku de bzhag ste
T02D2503-2:65a-44: / der phyag na rdo rje nyid dkyil 'khor ba'i
T02D2503-2:65a-45: sems dpa' lhag ma rnams kyi gzugs su 'byung ba'o
T02D2503-2:65a-46: / // mtshan ma ji lta bus byung zhe na /
T02D2503-2:65b-0: kun @65b na 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:65b-1: rin po che'i 'do zer kun nas 'bar ba des

T02D2503-2:65b-8: rin po che yad yin la sna tshogs pa yang yin pas na rdo rje dang /
T02D2503-2:65b-10: rin po che sna tshogs so //

T02D2503-2:65b-16: rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyal khams tham cad

T02D2503-2:65b-23: ni rdo rje'i nor bu dang rin po che yang
T02D2503-2:65b-24: yin pas rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen

T02D2503-2:65b-26: pas na rod rje'i nor bu rin po chen po'i
T02D2503-2:65b-28: de'i phyag na bsnams pa gang yin ba de ni
T02D2503-2:65b-29: rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i phyag
T02D2503-2:65b-30: rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2503-2:65b-31: de rnams cir 'gyur te byung zhe na /

T02D2503-2:65b-34: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:65b-35: de rnams kyi der ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2503-2:65b-36: rin po che chen po'i char phab pa la sogs
T02D2503-2:65b-37: pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu
T02D2503-2:65b-38: bar byas nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:65b-39: mgu bar byas nas slar yang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2503-2:65b-40: slar yang byon te zhes bya ba gsungs so //

T02D2503-2:105a-18: dag na 'di'i sems dag go zhes shes par bya'o

T02D2503-2:105b-0: @105b ji ltar shes zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la gnas na'o //

T02D2503-2:105b-9: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas ye shes kyi dngos

T02D2503-2:105b-17: gzung ngo // de ltar khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni zhes bya ba ste /

T02D2503-2:106a-9: 'jig rten thams cad la bltas par gyur pa yin

T02D2503-2:106a-16: de nyid la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:106a-17: ni rab tu byed pa 'di nyid kyi lhag ma
T02D2503-2:106a-18: ston te / de nyid la ni snyoms zhugs nas //

T02D2503-2:106a-22: la dmigs pa bzhin du phan tshun 'gro zhing 'chag

T02D2503-2:106a-24: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni phyogs nges pa gcig
T02D2503-2:106a-25: tu 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yin par shes par
T02D2503-2:106a-26: bya'o // ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs //

T02D2503-2:106a-28: gyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji ltar
T02D2503-2:106a-29: mthong ba de bzhin du gang gi don du ye

T02D2503-2:106a-32: don to // da ni snyoms par zhugs pa ste //

T02D2503-2:106a-34: bshad ma thag pa las ni spyod pas shes par
T02D2503-2:106a-35: bya ba bstan pa yin par zad kyi dngos po
T02D2503-2:106a-36: thams cad shes pa'i man ngag tu byas pa ni
T02D2503-2:106a-37: ma yin no // snyoms par zhugs pa ni rang
T02D2503-2:106a-38: gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas nas zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:106a-39: la sogs pa sngar bstan zin pa'o //

T02D2503-2:106b-4: de dang de ni de bzhin du //
T02D2503-2:106b-5: sems can rnams thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:106b-6: sems can zhes bya ba la srog chags gang dang
T02D2503-2:106b-7: gang gi dgos pa gang dang gang yin pa rnal
T02D2503-2:106b-9: bsams na de dang de ni zhes bya ba srog

T02D2503-2:106b-11: cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /

T02D2503-2:106b-14: su zhig gis de skad ces gsungs te /

T02D2503-2:106b-17: dngos grub kyi ye shes zhes bya ba la dngos grub ni dam pa grub pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:106b-18: de'i mtshan ma ni chos gang skyes pa las bdag
T02D2503-2:106b-19: gi dngos grub nye bar ston to zhes shes pa

T02D2503-2:106b-21: 'di nyid bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas nas
T02D2503-2:106b-22: dngos grub kyi ye shes zhes bstan pa yin no
T02D2503-2:106b-23: / de'i phyag rgya yin pas na dngos grub kyi
T02D2503-2:106b-24: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-2:106b-25: gang gi phyag rgya las ji skad gsungs pa shes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:106b-26: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung yin pas na dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do //
T02D2503-2:106b-27: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2503-2:106b-29: sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis //
T02D2503-2:106b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:106b-31: sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis //
T02D2503-2:106b-32: zhes bya ba la so sor snang ba gsal bar
T02D2503-2:106b-33: 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma
T02D2503-2:106b-34: ste / sems dba' ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de yin par shes par bya'o //

T02D2503-2:131a-30: lus kyi dbang po rdo rje rin chen du gyur
T02D2503-2:131a-31: pa'i bdag gi lus kyi dbang po de dbang bskur
T02D2503-2:131a-32: ba'i phyir phul na myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2503-2:131a-33: zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i dbang pos gsungs so
T02D2503-2:131a-34: // da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-2:131a-35: dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston
T02D2503-2:131a-36: // te / dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i chos so //
T02D2503-2:131a-37: de'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba 'di ni dam tshig gi dngos grub bo //
T02D2503-2:131a-38: de nyid ni gsang ba ste /
T02D2503-2:131a-39: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:131a-40: rgyud ni de ston pa'i gzhung ngo //
T02D2503-2:131a-41: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2503-2:131a-42: de las kyang dang por sa ma ya stvam zhes
T02D2503-2:131a-43: brjod cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2503-2:131a-44: gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:131a-45: rgyud ston te / sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod
T02D2503-2:131a-46: cing zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe zhe na
T02D2503-2:131a-47: rgyud ston te / / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing pa'i dus na'o //
T02D2503-2:131a-48: bud med kun la chags byas la //
T02D2503-2:131a-49: zhes bya ba la ni phyag rgya thams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D2503-2:131a-50: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod na
T02D2503-2:131b-0: gdod phyag rgya thams cad dgyes @131b par 'gyur gyi
T02D2503-2:131b-1: / de las gzhan du phyag rgya bcings na 'dis
T02D2503-2:131b-2: dam tshig mi shes pa yin no zhes phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:131b-3: rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:131b-5: sems can don gyis skyo ma mdzad //
T02D2503-2:131b-6: brjod na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2503-2:131b-7: rigs zlos pa'i rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya rnams la
T02D2503-2:131b-8: / bcom ldan 'das yum bdag la sems can gyi
T02D2503-2:131b-9: don mdzad cig ces brjod cing phyag rgya rnams la
T02D2503-2:131b-10: bskul ba de ltar byas na sangs rgyas rnams kyang
T02D2503-2:131b-11: des mnyes par byed do zhes gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:131b-12: de skad su zhig gis gsungs she na /
T02D2503-2:131b-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so zhes pa'o//
T02D2503-2:131b-14: da ni 'dod chags la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2503-2:131b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:131b-16: 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya //
T02D2503-2:131b-17: zhes bya ba la 'dod chags ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D2503-2:131b-18: de la brnyas par mi bya zhing spang bar mi bya ste /
T02D2503-2:131b-19: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dngos grub 'dod na bsgrub pa'i dus dang /
T02D2503-2:131b-20: bsnyen pa'i dus su byang chub kyi sems dang ldan
T02D2503-2:131b-21: pa kho nas thams cad du phyag rgya 'grub par
T02D2503-2:131b-22: 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:131b-23: bud med kun dang rtse byed pa //
T02D2503-2:131b-24: zhes bya ba la bud med ni phyag rgya ste
T02D2503-2:131b-25: de rtse bar byed pa ni mnyes par byed pa'o
T02D2503-2:131b-26: // de yang byang chub kyi sems brtan par gyur
T02D2503-2:131b-27: na phyag rgya rnams mnyes par 'gyur bas dngos grub
T02D2503-2:131b-29: 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba ste /
T02D2503-2:131b-30: byang chub kyi sems rab tu bsrungs na 'grub par
T02D2503-2:131b-31: 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad
T02D2503-2:131b-32: kyis gsungs so // da ni gsod pas 'jig rten
T02D2503-2:131b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje rigs kyi
T02D2503-2:131b-34: dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston
T02D2503-2:131b-35: kyis gsungs so // te / gsod pas zhes bya
T02D2503-2:131b-36: ba ni rnam 'byor pa gang mngon spyod kyi las
T02D2503-2:131b-37: rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gtogs par gsungs
T02D2503-2:131b-38: pa'i gsod pa la goms par byed pa gang yin
T02D2503-2:131b-39: pa de ni gsod bzhes bya'o //
T02D2503-2:131b-40: 'di lta bu nyid kyis 'jig rten pas dkyil gzhan
T02D2503-2:131b-41: gyis nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2503-2:131b-43: lus ngag las bzang dgyes pa dang //
T02D2503-2:132a-2: lus kyi las ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa khro bo rnams kyi g-yon brkyang ba dang /
T02D2503-2:132a-3: zhal bsnyer zhing mche ba gtsigs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang rjes su mthun par byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:132a-4: ngag gi las ni h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de dag ni lus ngag las so ;
T02D2503-2:132a-5: / bzang zhes bya ba ni dam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-2:132a-6: dgyes pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2503-2:132a-7: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags shing bzhed pa dang
T02D2503-2:132a-8: / h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas 'jig rten rnams gsad par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2503-2:132a-10: rnam dag phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no
T02D2503-2:132a-11: sems can rnam par sbyong bar bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D2503-2:132a-12: // ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ce na /
T02D2503-2:132a-13: gang gi phyir 'di ni gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba'i dam tshig yin te /
T02D2503-2:132a-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis lha chen
T02D2503-2:132a-15: po bsad pa dang 'dra bar bya ba'i da ni
T02D2503-2:132a-16: dam tshig yin pas na dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02D2503-2:132a-17: des ci zhig phyed ce na /
T02D2503-2:132a-18: don gyi grub pa sbyin pa'o //
T02D2503-2:132a-20: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don
T02D2503-2:132a-21: ni 'di lta bus 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du
T02D2503-2:132a-22: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:132a-23: da ni dag pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba la
T02D2503-2:132a-24: sogs pas padmo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub
T02D2503-2:132a-25: kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:132a-26: dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag / ces bya
T02D2503-2:132a-27: ba la 'dod chags ni sems can smin pa dang
T02D2503-2:132a-29: rgyu de'i phyir sems can rnams la chags pa gang
T02D2503-2:132a-30: yin pa de ni dag pa'i bdag nyid de sangs
T02D2503-2:132a-31: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nyon mongs
T02D2503-2:132a-32: pa zad pa yin la de dag gi dag pa'i
T02D2503-2:132a-33: bdag nyid yin pas dag pa nyid de /
T02D2503-2:132a-34: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bsam pa la bya ste /
T02D2503-2:132a-35: bsam pa dag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:132a-36: de ltar na 'dod chags 'di ni dag pa yin
T02D2503-2:132a-37: te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bskyed pa'i rgyus
T02D2503-2:132a-39: sems can rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:132a-40: mu stegs rnal 'byor can ma dag / ces bya
T02D2503-2:132a-41: ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtsho la 'jug
T02D2503-2:132a-42: par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs nas
T02D2503-2:132b-0: / gang ston pa gzhan @132b gyis bstan pa'i thabs
T02D2503-2:132b-1: gang yin pa de la mu stegs pa zhes bya
T02D2503-2:132b-2: / ste / 'jug dogs bzhin du mu stegs 'cha' bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:132b-3: der gang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de ni mu stegs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:132b-4: de rnams kyi rnal 'byor ni mu stegs kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-2:132b-5: thar pa'i don du sems mnyam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:132b-6: de gang la yod pa de ni mu stegs rnal 'byor can no //
T02D2503-2:132b-7: de rnams kyi 'dod chags ni ma dag pa yin te /
T02D2503-2:132b-8: gang gi phyir de dag la bdag gis sems can
T02D2503-2:132b-9: thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2503-2:132b-10: ba'i smon lam 'di lta bu med kyi /
T02D2503-2:132b-11: gzhan du na bdag cag rnams bcings pa las grol
T02D2503-2:132b-12: bar bya'o snyam du sems par zad de de'i phyir
T02D2503-2:132b-13: sems can rnams la byams shing smin pa dang grol
T02D2503-2:132b-14: ba'i bsam pa cung zad cig yod du zin kyang
T02D2503-2:132b-15: de nyid bcings pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-2:132b-16: mu stegs rnal 'byor can ma dag / ces bya
T02D2503-2:132b-17: ba gsungs te de bas na de spangs la dag
T02D2503-2:132b-18: pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig gis bsrungs na zhes bya
T02D2503-2:132b-19: ba sems can smin pa dang grol ba'i chags pa
T02D2503-2:132b-20: bskyed na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom
T02D2503-2:132b-21: ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
T02D2503-2:132b-22: gsungs so // da ni rdo rje nor bu zhes
T02D2503-2:132b-23: bya ba la sogs pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam
T02D2503-2:132b-24: tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te
T02D2503-2:132b-25: gsungs so // / rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la //
T02D2503-2:132b-26: zhes bya ba la rdo rje nor bu ni rdo
T02D2503-2:132b-27: rje rin chen gyi myu gu'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-2:132b-28: rgya ste de sngar bcing ba'o //
T02D2503-2:132b-31: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2503-2:132b-33: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po'i dam tshig rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:132b-34: ma rungs rnams kyi nor 'phrogs nas //
T02D2503-2:132b-35: zhes bya ba ni gang dag nor rnyed pa dang
T02D2503-2:132b-36: sems can rnams la 'tshe zhing bstan pa la gnod
T02D2503-2:132b-37: pa byed pa / ma rungs pa de lta bu
T02D2503-2:132b-38: de'i nor 'phrogs pa ni gdul ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul
T02D2503-2:132b-39: gyi nor rnams dus cung zad cig mi snang bar
T02D2503-2:132b-40: pa byed pa / bya'o // dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur //
T02D2503-2:132b-42: 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig
T02D2503-2:132b-43: yin pas na 'di bsrungs na dngos grub sbyin par
T02D2503-2:132b-44: 'gyur ro // da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-2:132b-45: cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud
T02D2503-2:133a-1: rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rig pa dang /
T02D2503-2:133a-2: 'dul ba'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de bsrungs
T02D2503-2:133a-3: pas 'grub pa ni chos kyi dngos grub ste de
T02D2503-2:133a-4: nyid gzhan gyis mi shes pas na gsang ba'o //
T02D2503-2:133a-5: de ston pa'i gzhung yin pas na chos kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud do //
T02D2503-2:133a-6: de las kyang dang por chos rnams zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:133a-7: la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos
T02D2503-2:133a-8: grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:133a-9: chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni //
T02D2503-2:133a-10: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang //
T02D2503-2:133a-11: zhes bya ba ni don 'di nyid dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang du bya ste /
T02D2503-2:133a-12: dngos grub dam pa'i rab tu byed par tshig tu
T02D2503-2:133a-13: brjod na dngos grub 'thob bo zhes smras zin la
T02D2503-2:133a-15: chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni //
T02D2503-2:133a-16: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang //
T02D2503-2:133a-17: zhes bya ba la bye brag 'di yod de /
T02D2503-2:133a-18: sngar ni brjod pa tsam du zad kyi 'dir ni bsgom pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:133a-20: chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni //
T02D2503-2:133a-21: zhes bya bar ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:133a-22: de rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgom pa ste /
T02D2503-2:133a-23: sems rtse gcig pas bsgom pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133a-24: dgos pa thams cad byas na ni //
T02D2503-2:133a-25: zhes bya ba ni sngags gzung ba dang /
T02D2503-2:133a-27: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs pa'i las thams cad byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133a-28: de la yang mchil ma dang /
T02D2503-2:133a-31: gci ba la sogs pa 'dor ba na khrus la sogs pa'i cho ga med du zin kyang /
T02D2503-2:133a-32: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par bsgoms na
T02D2503-2:133a-33: sangs rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'thob ces gsungs pa yin
T02D2503-2:133a-34: te / chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2503-2:133a-35: zlos pa'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i che dus thams
T02D2503-2:133a-36: cad du dgos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:133a-37: da ni sems can kun zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2503-2:133a-38: pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos
T02D2503-2:133a-39: grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te ;
T02D2503-2:133a-40: sems can kun la chags byed cing //
T02D2503-2:133a-41: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la mnyes gzhin pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133a-42: yul la skyo bar ma gyur la //
T02D2503-2:133a-43: zhes bya ba la yul ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:133a-44: de rnams la yang skyo bar mi byed pa ni
T02D2503-2:133b-0: ci rigs pa dang ci 'byor par longs spyod @133b
T02D2503-2:133b-1: pa'o // bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni //
T02D2503-2:133b-2: zhes bya ba la bud med ni phyag rgyar gsungs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:133b-3: de la dga' ba ni phyag rgya chen po bsgo pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-4: de'i dag pa ni bsgoms pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-5: gsang chos dngos grub mchog sbyin no //
T02D2503-2:133b-6: zhes bya ba la 'di gsum char yang gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:133b-7: chos yin pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zlos pa rnams
T02D2503-2:133b-10: de la dngos grub mchog sbyin no //
T02D2503-2:133b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung bas gsungs so zhes pa ste /
T02D2503-2:133b-12: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2503-2:133b-13: da ni rdo rje phra mo'i zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:133b-14: sogs pas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub
T02D2503-2:133b-15: kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:133b-16: rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zlos pa'i
T02D2503-2:133b-17: rnal 'byor pas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D2503-2:133b-18: / rdo rje phra mo'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2503-2:133b-19: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin goms par byas la /
T02D2503-2:133b-20: sna'i h'um gi sbyor ba yis ;
T02D2503-2:133b-21: / ma rungs thams cad gsad na ni //
T02D2503-2:133b-22: zhes bya ba la sna'i rtse mor rdo rje bsgoms la h'um zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
T02D2503-2:133b-23: gsang la chad pas gcod par 'dod pa de la
T02D2503-2:133b-24: h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas par bsam zhing sbyor
T02D2503-2:133b-25: ba 'dis gsad pa ni chad pas gcod pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-27: rdo rje de 'bab pa na rab tu 'bar zhing
T02D2503-2:133b-28: mche ba gcig las brgya stong du mar gyur par
T02D2503-2:133b-29: ci nus par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-32: zhes gsungs te mchog ni dam pa'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-33: da ni rdo rje phra mo zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:133b-34: sogs pas padmo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi
T02D2503-2:133b-36: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-2:133b-37: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2503-2:133b-39: lce ni rkan la bcar nas su //
T02D2503-2:133b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sna'i rtse mor rdo
T02D2503-2:133b-41: rje phra mo bsgoms la rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor
T02D2503-2:133b-42: ba des bud med kun dang rtse byed na ste
T02D2503-2:133b-45: rdo rje phra mo'i bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2503-2:133b-46: du bsgom par bya ba la sna'i rtse mor bzhag
T02D2503-2:133b-47: ste / spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul bya ba
T02D2503-2:133b-48: ji lta ba de bzhin du phyag rgya thams cad
T02D2503-2:133b-49: sna'i rtse mor bzhag la spro ba dang bsdu ba'i
T02D2503-2:133b-51: de ltar na de rtse bar byed cing chags pa dang /
T02D2503-2:134a-2: chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2503-2:134a-4: chos kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs
T02D2503-2:134a-5: pa'i dngos grub ni chos kyi dngos grub ste de
T02D2503-2:134a-7: phyag rgya de ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:134a-8: rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2503-2:134a-10: da ni dbang po gnyis ni zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:134a-11: sogs pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi gsang
T02D2503-2:134a-13: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02D2503-2:134a-14: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2503-2:134a-15: su zhig dang ldan pa'i dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor zhe na /
T02D2503-2:134a-16: bud med dam ni sdug pa dang //
T02D2503-2:134a-18: bud med ni phyag rgya ste de dang dbang po mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D2503-2:134a-19: sdug pa dang zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid kyi ste rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-2:134a-20: de bas na de dang lhan cig dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'o ;
T02D2503-2:134a-21: / des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2503-2:134a-22: re ba thams cad yongs bskang na //
