T02D2503-2:137a-31: bsam pa kun gyi dngos grub las //
T02D2503-2:137a-32: 'dod chags bsam pa dngos grub mchog / ces bya
T02D2503-2:137a-33: ba ni bsam pa'i dngos grub gang ci yang rung
T02D2503-2:137a-34: ba de thams cad kyi nang na bsam pa'i don
T02D2503-2:137a-35: grub pa de ni 'dod chags kyi bsam pa dngos
T02D2503-2:137a-36: grub kyi cho ga yin te /
T02D2503-2:137a-37: 'dod chags ni yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che'i chags pa ste /
T02D2503-2:137a-38: de grub pa ni dngos grub thams cad kyi nang
T02D2503-2:137a-39: na phul du byung ba yin pas mchog yin no
T02D2503-2:137a-41: grub shig grub shig sems dpa' che //
T02D2503-2:137a-42: bcom ldan thams cad grub pa po //
T02D2503-2:137a-44: gang gi phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
T02D2503-2:137a-45: che grub na des don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2503-2:137b-0: ba'i phyir ro // de skad @137b smras nas dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2503-2:137b-1: thams cad du ni zhugs gyur na //
T02D2503-2:137b-2: zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed ba thams cad kyi don gyi mjug sdud pa yin te /
T02D2503-2:137b-3: rin po che'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyang don gyi zhar la bsdus pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:137b-4: mchod pa gsang ba bla med pa'i //
T02D2503-2:137b-6: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir mchod pa bla
T02D2503-2:137b-7: na med pa yin pa de'i phyir dngos grub kyi
T02D2503-2:137b-8: dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2503-2:137b-9: to // de phyin chad ni grub bdag nyid //
T02D2503-2:137b-11: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang ba'i bskul bas mchod ba byas la'o //
T02D2503-2:137b-12: mchod pa 'di gang gi tshe bya zhe na /
T02D2503-2:137b-13: gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na //
T02D2503-2:137b-14: de'i tshe de nyid bskul na 'grub //
T02D2503-2:137b-15: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:137b-16: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:137b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyir gtogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2503-2:137b-18: de dag gis gsang ba'i dngos grub ni snyan pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
T02D2503-2:137b-19: dngos grub kyang tshogs dang rjes su mthun pa ste /
T02D2503-2:137b-20: bskul ba'i tha snyad 'dis mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:137b-21: de bas na sba ba'i tshul du gnas pa'i bskul
T02D2503-2:137b-22: ba gang yin pa des bskul na dgos te gsang
T02D2503-2:137b-23: zhing sba ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D2503-2:137b-25: 'das ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni dag pa'i
T02D2503-2:137b-26: dngos grub gsang ba'i rab tu byed pas gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:137b-28: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyis bskul bas dkyil
T02D2503-2:137b-29: 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-2:137b-30: pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams bskul ba yin
T02D2503-2:137b-31: la / da ltar ni dkyil 'khor de dag nyid
T02D2503-2:137b-32: du 'khor ba'i tha snyad dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D2503-2:137b-33: gsang zhing sba ba'i tshul gyis bskul bas phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:137b-34: rnam pa bzhi skul bar byed pa yin te bye
T02D2503-2:137b-36: de las kyang dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes
T02D2503-2:137b-37: bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
T02D2503-2:137b-38: rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:137b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo che //
T02D2503-2:137b-40: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02D2503-2:138a-0: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni lha thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i @138a * //
T02D2503-2:138a-1: phyir na lha chen po yin la /
T02D2503-2:138a-2: de'i sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag
T02D2503-2:138a-3: rgya bzhi po ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu
T02D2503-2:138a-4: phyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin zhing de
T02D2503-2:138a-5: la ni lha mo chen mo zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-2:138a-6: de rnams ni lha chen po de'i phyag rgya yin pas na lha mo che zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-2:138a-7: lha mo chen mo de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2503-2:138a-8: sdug cing zhes bya ba ste sdug pa ni bla
T02D2503-2:138a-9: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2503-2:138a-10: kyi don gyi mtshan nyid kyi don yun ring po
T02D2503-2:138a-11: nas bsams bsams pa de sbyin par byed pas na
T02D2503-2:138a-12: sdug pa'o // de nyid kyis ni bde ba kun sbyin pa yang yin te /
T02D2503-2:138a-13: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:138a-14: 'di dag thams cad kyang bden pa yin te yang
T02D2503-2:138a-15: dag pa dang phyin ci ma log pa yin la
T02D2503-2:138a-16: / de'i don skul bar byed pa'i tshig gang yin
T02D2503-2:138a-17: pa de yang bden pa las byung ba'i tshig yin
T02D2503-2:138a-18: / no // de lta bu'i bden pa des bsgrub pa ni bskul ba'o //
T02D2503-2:138a-20: gal te de ni ma grub na'o //
T02D2503-2:138a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zlos pa'i rnal 'byor bas
T02D2503-2:138a-23: dkyil 'khor du zhugs te bsgrubs kyang dngos grub rnyed
T02D2503-2:138a-24: par ma gyur na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bris
T02D2503-2:138a-25: te / dkyil 'khor du dag pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
T02D2503-2:138a-26: pas bdag po la bskul zhing phyag rgya la yang
T02D2503-2:138a-27: 'di bzhin du bskul ba byas na de'i 'og tu
T02D2503-2:138a-28: gdod grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:138a-29: da ni ltag 'og ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:138a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2503-2:138a-31: gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:138a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zlos pa'i rnal 'byor bas
T02D2503-2:138a-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pas
T02D2503-2:138a-34: so // sngar dngos grub ma thob na gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:138a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bris la
T02D2503-2:138a-36: so // / der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2503-2:138a-37: dpa' la dag pa'i dngos grub kyis bskul bas yang
T02D2503-2:138a-40: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2503-2:138a-41: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni //
T02D2503-2:138a-43: zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02D2503-2:138a-44: phyag rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin //
T02D2503-2:138a-45: zhes bya bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yongs
T02D2503-2:138a-46: su bsgom pa la de kho na nyid kyi gsang
T02D2503-2:138b-0: ba 'di yang @138b rdo rje tshig gis brjod par
T02D2503-2:138b-1: bya'o // bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D2503-2:138b-2: khyod nga'i chung ma snying la gnas //
T02D2503-2:138b-4: gang gi phyir 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la gnas pa yin la /
T02D2503-2:138b-5: de nas 'di bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin no //
T02D2503-2:138b-6: phyag rgya chen po de yang 'di'i chung ma yin te /
T02D2503-2:138b-7: gang gi phyir 'di des gang bar bya zhing rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2503-2:138b-8: yan lag thams cad brtan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:138b-9: snying la gnas zhes bya ba ni bsgoms par gyur
T02D2503-2:138b-10: pa na don snang bar byas pa'i phyir sems la
T02D2503-2:138b-12: lus kun la ni 'khyud nas kyang //
T02D2503-2:138b-13: zhes bya ba ni lha yongs su bzung ba'i gzugs su yongs su 'khyud pa ste /
T02D2503-2:138b-14: gang gi phyir mi'i lus khu ba dang khrag las byung ba gang yin pa de bor nas /
T02D2503-2:138b-15: dngos grub kyi dus su lha'i gzugs su 'gyur dgos
T02D2503-2:138b-16: pas na de'i phyir lus thams cad la 'khyud pa
T02D2503-2:138b-17: ste lha'i lus la yongs su gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-2:138b-18: de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2503-2:138b-19: mngon sum kho nar rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du
T02D2503-2:138b-20: byed pa'i tshe / dgug pa dang /
T02D2503-2:138b-23: dbang du bya ba byas nas bdag gi lus 'di
T02D2503-2:138b-24: ma lus par yongs su bzhes la lha'i skur yongs
T02D2503-2:138b-25: su gyur par mdzad du gsol zhes de la bskul
T02D2503-2:138b-26: zhing / kye rdo rje snying po nam mkha' la
T02D2503-2:138b-27: bteg ste rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du mdzad pa
T02D2503-2:138b-28: la stsol cig ces brjod de /
T02D2503-2:138b-29: bdag nyid yang dag spang bar bsam zhing bdag la
T02D2503-2:138b-30: nga ni rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes nga rgyal yang
T02D2503-2:138b-31: bskyed par bya'o // de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2503-2:138b-33: ye shes tshe stobs gzugs mchog rnams //
T02D2503-2:138b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2503-2:138b-37: rdo rje 'gying ba lha mo che //
T02D2503-2:138b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di'i 'bras bu ston to //
T02D2503-2:138b-39: de ni grub shig grub shig ces bya ba la
T02D2503-2:138b-40: sogs pas rdo rje rigs kyi sgo nas dam tshig
T02D2503-2:138b-41: gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:138b-42: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas
T02D2503-2:138b-43: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:138b-44: snying gar bcings la bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs
T02D2503-2:139a-0: dkyil 'khor du dag pa'i dngos grub kyis bskul bas bcom ldan 'das @139a * //
T02D2503-2:139a-1: de la yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-2: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gar gnas
T02D2503-2:139a-3: pa la grub shig grub shig ces bya ba la
T02D2503-2:139a-4: sogs pa'i dam tshig gis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-5: dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-6: da ni dam tshig ces bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:139a-7: khyod da'i sdug ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pas na sdug pa ste /
T02D2503-2:139a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis sdug par
T02D2503-2:139a-9: mdzad na grub par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de
T02D2503-2:139a-10: bzhin du nga yang khyod la sdug par byed kyis
T02D2503-2:139a-11: nga yang grub par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-12: zhes bskul myur du chags gyur nas //
T02D2503-2:139a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpar nges pa
T02D2503-2:139a-15: dang bdag tu nges pa 'di lta bus grub par
T02D2503-2:139a-16: 'gyur ba'o // da ni rtogs shig ces bya ba
T02D2503-2:139a-17: la sogs pas padmo'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D2503-2:139a-18: gsang ba'i dngos grub ston te /
T02D2503-2:139a-19: padmo'i rigs zlos pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du bris te /
T02D2503-2:139a-20: der zhugs la bsgrub pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2503-2:139a-21: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la dag pa'i dngos
T02D2503-2:139a-22: grub kyi gsang bas bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-23: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rtogs shig rtogs shig
T02D2503-2:139a-24: ces bya ba la sogs pas bskul bar bya ste
T02D2503-2:139a-25: / gang gi phyir chos kyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D2503-2:139a-26: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas na
T02D2503-2:139a-27: de la rtogs shig rtogs shig ces bya ba 'dis
T02D2503-2:139a-28: bskul lo // nga yi chung ma khyod rab tu
T02D2503-2:139a-29: sdug ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir rdzogs par
T02D2503-2:139a-30: bya zhing gang bar bya ba yin la de bsgom
T02D2503-2:139a-31: par bya ba yin pas na de la shin tu
T02D2503-2:139a-32: sdug cing yid du 'ong bar bsgrub dgos pa yin
T02D2503-2:139a-33: pa'i phyir rab tu sdug pa'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-34: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D2503-2:139a-35: da ni lus kun zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:139a-36: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:139a-37: dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:139a-38: 'dir yang bsgrub pa'i dus na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-2:139a-39: bris ta zhugs la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las
T02D2503-2:139a-40: kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas dkyil 'khor du
T02D2503-2:139a-41: dag pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang bas bskul te /
T02D2503-2:139a-42: bsgrub pa'i tshe na las kyi phyag rgya la las
T02D2503-2:139a-43: kun byed pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas yang
T02D2503-2:139a-45: de la bye brag ni 'di yin te /
T02D2503-2:139b-0: 'dir ni las kyi @139b phyag rgyal bskul ba yin la /
T02D2503-2:139b-1: gang du ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyi
T02D2503-2:139b-2: las phal mo cher bshad zin pa nyid yin no
T02D2503-2:139b-3: // phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de //
T02D2503-2:139b-4: da ni dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston to //
T02D2503-2:139b-5: de las thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig
T02D2503-2:139b-6: gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de de
T02D2503-2:139b-7: bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i
T02D2503-2:139b-8: phyag rgya bzhi ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma la
T02D2503-2:139b-9: sogs pa ste / ye shes kyi pha rol tu
T02D2503-2:139b-10: phyin pa la sogs pa yin pas na dam tshig
T02D2503-2:139b-11: gi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2503-2:139b-13: de dag nyid gsang ba ste gang gi tshe bcom
T02D2503-2:139b-14: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod pa'i khams
T02D2503-2:139b-15: kyi dbang phyug las rnam par rgyal bar mdzad pas
T02D2503-2:139b-16: na lha chen po dbang phyug gi gzugs su sprul
T02D2503-2:139b-17: zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe na /
T02D2503-2:139b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi ngo bo
T02D2503-2:139b-19: bud med rin po che'i gzugs lta bur sprul cing
T02D2503-2:139b-21: 'dod pa'i khams kyi bdag po de'i nga rgyal du
T02D2503-2:139b-22: 'dod pa'i khams na nga'i 'dod pa rnams las khyad
T02D2503-2:139b-23: par du 'phags pa gzhan gang yang med do snyam
T02D2503-2:139b-24: pa'i nga rgyal de lta bus su la yang 'dud
T02D2503-2:139b-25: par mi byed cing su'i yang bsgo ba nyan bar
T02D2503-2:139b-26: mi byed do // de bas na de 'dul ba'i
T02D2503-2:139b-27: phyir bcom ldan 'das lha chen po dbang phyug gi
T02D2503-2:139b-28: gzugs su sbrul bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D2503-2:139b-29: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams gdul bar
T02D2503-2:139b-30: bya ba'i phyir nang gi btsun mo'i 'khor bstan pa
T02D2503-2:139b-31: dang / 'dir yang ka pi na gdul ba'i phyir
T02D2503-2:139b-32: 'khor los sgrub ba chen por sprul par mdzad cing
T02D2503-2:139b-33: dang / / pha rol tu phyin pa de rnams
T02D2503-2:139b-34: nang gi btsun mo'i 'khor du sprul pa mdzad pa
T02D2503-2:139b-35: dang / / yin no // de nas dbang phyug chen po dang /
T02D2503-2:139b-36: lha'i bu de dag gi nang gi btsun mo'i tshogs mthong zhing /
T02D2503-2:139b-37: ka pi nas kyang nang gi btsun mo'i tshogs mthong
T02D2503-2:139b-38: ba dang rang gi 'dod pa ni shin tu zhan
T02D2503-2:139b-39: pa zhig go snyam pa'i blo skyes so //
T02D2503-2:139b-40: de nas nga rgyal dang bral bar gyur pa dang
T02D2503-2:139b-41: bcom ldan 'das la gus pa'i blo skyes pa yin
T02D2503-2:139b-42: no // de ltar nga rgyal dang bral ba'i sems
T02D2503-2:139b-43: kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen pa bkur byas pa
T02D2503-2:139b-44: no // dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos ston par mdzad de /
T02D2503-2:140a-1: bu rnams kyis ni sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug thob pa la /
T02D2503-2:140a-2: ka pi nas ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
T02D2503-2:140a-3: de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi btsun mo de
T02D2503-2:140a-4: dag la mu stegs pa rnams kyis ngan sems mi
T02D2503-2:140a-5: skye bar de dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir ri
T02D2503-2:140a-6: mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bkod pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:140a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa zlos pas kyang bsgrub pa'i tshe
T02D2503-2:140a-8: na bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo lta
T02D2503-2:140a-9: bur bris la / dkyil 'khor der ni khyab pa'i btsun mo ste /
T02D2503-2:140a-10: kun gtong ba ni bdag stsol cig / ces dag
T02D2503-2:140a-11: pa'i dngos grub kyi bskul bas bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2503-2:140a-12: bskul ba dang ; de bzhin gshags pa'i lha mo che //
T02D2503-2:140a-13: sdug cing bde ba kun sbyin pa //
T02D2503-2:140a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyag rgya gsang ba'i
T02D2503-2:140a-15: dngos grub kyi rgyud kyis phyag rgya rnams la yang
T02D2503-2:140a-16: dag par bskul bar bya ba gsang zhing sba ba
T02D2503-2:140a-18: mu stegs rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:140a-19: bdag nyid la nges pa'i shes ba skyes na 'grub

T02D2503-2:155b-12: zhes bya ba la ting nge 'dzin gyi las yin pas na ting nge 'dzin gyi las so //
T02D2503-2:155b-13: las de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2503-2:155b-14: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa //
T02D2503-2:155b-15: zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas dam tshig la gnas te /
T02D2503-2:155b-16: dam tshig sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje phra mo bsgoms la de'i 'og tu /
T02D2503-2:155b-17: dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med //
T02D2503-2:155b-18: ces bya bas dam pa'i chos bsgoms te /
T02D2503-2:155b-19: de nas 'dir ting nge 'dzin gyi las sangs rgyas
T02D2503-2:155b-20: kyi gzugs rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D2503-2:155b-22: de ltar rim gyis bsgoms na dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:155b-23: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:155b-24: sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge
T02D2503-2:155b-25: 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te
T02D2503-2:155b-26: / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2503-2:155b-27: bla med las ni mang po rnams //
T02D2503-2:155b-28: zhes bya ba la bla med las ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar grub pa'o //
T02D2503-2:155b-29: mang po rnams ni phal cher ba'o //
T02D2503-2:155b-31: sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad kyang //
T02D2503-2:155b-32: zhes bya ba ste sems dpa' kun ni sems dpa'
T02D2503-2:155b-33: bcu drug ste de dag thams cad rdo rje sems
T02D2503-2:155b-34: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las gyur pa'o //
T02D2503-2:155b-35: thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa
T02D2503-2:155b-36: ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rdo rje
T02D2503-2:155b-37: sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las yin no //
T02D2503-2:155b-38: shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur //
T02D2503-2:155b-39: zhes bya ba ni de ltar shes shing bsgoms na
T02D2503-2:155b-40: 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2503-2:155b-42: da ni sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:155b-43: rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi
T02D2503-2:155b-44: dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:155b-45: sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir //
T02D2503-2:155b-46: zhes bya ba ni la la zhig mtshams med pa
T02D2503-2:155b-47: la sogs pa'i las byed pa la zhugs la de
T02D2503-2:156a-1: gzhan gang gis kyang mi nus pa de ni de
T02D2503-2:156a-2: ltar sdig pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin pas
T02D2503-2:156a-4: de bas na sdig pa de sbyong ba'i phyir ti
T02D2503-2:156a-5: de rab tu 'dul bar byed pa ni gsod pa'i
T02D2503-2:156a-6: las yin no // de ltar na sdig pa'i chos
T02D2503-2:156a-7: la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang lha chen
T02D2503-2:156a-9: / gsod pa'i las la dang na des dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes //
T02D2503-2:156a-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so zhes
T02D2503-2:156a-11: pa ste rdo rje rigs 'dir ni gsod cing tshar
T02D2503-2:156a-12: gcod pa'i las la dad par byas pa yin par
T02D2503-2:156a-13: shes par bya'o // da ni sdig kun zhes bya
T02D2503-2:156a-14: ba la sogs pas padmo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2503-2:156a-15: gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:156a-16: sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag / ces bya
T02D2503-2:156a-17: ba ni sdig pa dag pa'i thabs padmo'i rigs las
T02D2503-2:156a-18: gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i bshags pa'i rnam pa
T02D2503-2:156a-19: des sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag
T02D2503-2:156a-20: nyid kun dag par des byed do //
T02D2503-2:156a-21: dgos pa kun zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes shes nas /
T02D2503-2:156a-22: rnal 'byor pa de dgos pa thams cad byed de
T02D2503-2:156a-23: khrus la sogs pa la mi ltos par sgrub pa
T02D2503-2:156a-24: dang sngar bsnyen pa'i rang bzhin byed de las 'di
T02D2503-2:156a-25: ni padmo'i rigs kyi yin par shes shing don dam
T02D2503-2:156a-26: pa bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan
T02D2503-2:156a-28: da ni sred ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:156a-29: nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi
T02D2503-2:156a-30: dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:156a-31: sred ldan dbul ba thams cad ni //
T02D2503-2:156a-32: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du re
T02D2503-2:156a-33: ba'i sred pa gang la yod pa de ni sred
T02D2503-2:156a-35: de su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2503-2:156a-37: de dag la ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2503-2:156a-38: bsam pa kun bskar la zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:156a-39: ji srid cig gi bar du zhe na rtag tu'o //
T02D2503-2:156a-40: don kun grub pa'i kun bdag ni //
T02D2503-2:156a-41: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying
T02D2503-2:156a-42: po'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom zhing don thams cad
T02D2503-2:156a-43: grub pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang
T02D2503-2:156a-44: bzhin bsams na kun gyi bdag nyid de yid bzhin
T02D2503-2:156a-45: gyi nor bu'i rgyal por 'grub par 'gyur ba 'di
T02D2503-2:156a-46: la the tshom med do zhes bcom ldan 'das rin
T02D2503-2:156a-47: po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:156a-48: rigs thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2503-2:156a-49: dngos grub kyi rgyud do zhes bya ba ni mjug
T02D2503-2:156b-0: rigs thams cad kyi las @156b kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2503-2:156b-1: gyi dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid la ting
T02D2503-2:156b-2: nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub ces gsungs pa yin no
T02D2503-2:156b-3: // da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:156b-4: rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa las grub pa yin
T02D2503-2:156b-5: pa'i phyir phra mo'i dngos grub ste de ston pa'i
T02D2503-2:156b-6: rgyud do // de la dang por rtag tu rdo
T02D2503-2:156b-7: rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-2:156b-8: pa'i phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:156b-9: rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul //
T02D2503-2:156b-10: 'bad pa kun gyis sbyor na ni //
T02D2503-2:156b-11: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa
T02D2503-2:156b-12: 'bad pa thams cad kyis rtag tu goms par byed
T02D2503-2:156b-13: na'o // rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D2503-2:156b-14: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2503-2:156b-17: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:156b-18: 'dis ni rdo rje phra mo'i bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa yin no //
T02D2503-2:156b-19: da ni slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:156b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub
T02D2503-2:156b-22: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas rdo rje phra mo
T02D2503-2:156b-23: bsgom pa goms par byas pa'i 'og tu phyag rgyas
T02D2503-2:156b-24: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i las byed par
T02D2503-2:156b-25: 'dod na phyag rgya gsang ba rnams shin tu spa
T02D2503-2:156b-26: bar bya dgos te de bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2503-2:156b-27: / slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni //
T02D2503-2:156b-29: 'di skad gsungs te phyag rgya ni slob dpon 'ba'
T02D2503-2:156b-30: zhig la bstan par bya'i gzhan la ni ma yin
T02D2503-2:156b-31: no zhes pa'o // slob dpon gang gis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2503-2:156b-32: gang las rgyud thos pa dang /
T02D2503-2:156b-33: gang gi thob nas las kyi man ngag mnos pa de yang slob dpon yin te /
T02D2503-2:156b-34: gsum po 'di dag kyang phrag dog med cing phan par 'dod pa ni slob dpon dngos yin no //
T02D2503-2:156b-35: slob dpon gyis kyang slob ma'i mdun du phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:156b-36: bstan par bya'o zhes gnang bar bya ba'i don gyis
T02D2503-2:156b-37: na slob min la min zhes dgag pa mdzad pa
T02D2503-2:156b-38: yin no // de lta bas na slob dpon gyis
T02D2503-2:156b-39: slob ma la phyag rgya bstan par bya'i gzhan la
T02D2503-2:156b-40: ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2503-2:156b-41: slob ma yang bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'am gzhan
T02D2503-2:156b-42: dag gis dbang bskur ba zhig yin na yang ji
T02D2503-2:156b-43: skad gsungs pa'i tshul gyis dad pa dang ldan pa
T02D2503-2:156b-44: theg pa chen po'i chos la mngon par brtson pa
T02D2503-2:156b-45: sngags spyod pa'i tshul la the tshom med pa /
T02D2503-2:157a-3: cang shes pa'i tshul gyis nga rgyal spangs pa /
T02D2503-2:157a-4: bsam pa la g-yo sgyu med pa /
T02D2503-2:157a-5: gus pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2503-2:157a-6: slob ma de yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yon
T02D2503-2:157a-7: tan dang ldan pa zhig na de'i mdun du phyag
T02D2503-2:157a-8: rgya bstan par bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin
T02D2503-2:157a-9: no zhes rnam par gnas so //
T02D2503-2:157a-10: bu yang bdag gis dbang bskur ba'am /
T02D2503-2:157a-11: gzhan gyis dbang bskur ba ji skad smos pa'i yon
T02D2503-2:157a-12: tan rnams dang ldan pa la bstan par bya'i de
T02D2503-2:157a-13: ma yin pa la phyag rgya bstan par mi bya'o
T02D2503-2:157a-14: zhes bya ba yin te de'i phyir slar gnang bar
T02D2503-2:157a-15: gsungs pa ni bu min pa'i zhes gsungs pa yin
T02D2503-2:157a-17: bu ni 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig yin na phyag rgya bstan par bya'i //
T02D2503-2:157a-18: gzhan dag la ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D2503-2:157a-19: gang gi phyir phas ni bu la phan gdags pa'i
T02D2503-2:157a-20: tshul la zhugs pa yin pas snod ma yin pa
T02D2503-2:157a-21: zhig yin na yang phan pa ma yin pa las
T02D2503-2:157a-22: bzlog cing ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan dang phyis
T02D2503-2:157a-24: sems can phan par srid pa dang //
T02D2503-2:157a-25: gzhan yang la la nye du dang yid gcugs pa
T02D2503-2:157a-26: zhig la gnod pa las ni bzlog cing phan pa
T02D2503-2:157a-27: la ni sbyor ba zhig yin na ji skad du
T02D2503-2:157a-28: smras pa'i tshig nyams su len par byed kyi /
T02D2503-2:157a-29: ngan du mi smra ba zhig yin na de'i mdun
T02D2503-2:157a-30: du yang gal te bstan na bstan par zad de
T02D2503-2:157a-31: bu zhes smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam
T02D2503-2:157a-32: du zad do // de yang gal te ngan du
T02D2503-2:157a-33: smra zhing ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan bskyed par
T02D2503-2:157a-34: mi nus pa zhig yin na yid gcugs par bya
T02D2503-2:157a-35: ba gang yang rung ba de'i mdun du phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:157a-37: ci'i phyir de dag gi mdun du bstan par mi bya zhe na gang gi phyir /
T02D2503-2:157a-38: de dag phyag rgya gsang bas 'grub //
T02D2503-2:157a-39: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so zhes pa ste /
T02D2503-2:157a-40: gsang bas zhes bya ba shin tu sbas shing gsang
T02D2503-2:157a-41: na 'grub par 'gyur gyi thams cad du smras pa
T02D2503-2:157a-42: ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:157a-43: da ni rdo rje phra mo zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:157a-44: sogs pas rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub
T02D2503-2:157a-46: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-2:157a-48: lce ni rkan la bcar nas su //
T02D2503-2:157a-49: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas so //
T02D2503-2:157a-50: sna nas h'um byung ldan gyur la //
T02D2503-2:157a-51: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis
T02D2503-2:157b-0: sna'i rtse mor @157b rdo rje bsams la h'um zhes
T02D2503-2:157b-2: h'um zhes bya ba de dang rlung dang bcas pas
T02D2503-2:157b-3: gcig gam gnyis sam mang por bya ba dgos pa
T02D2503-2:157b-4: dang rjes su mthun pa'i rdo rje 'bab par bsam
T02D2503-2:157b-6: rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2503-2:157b-8: de nas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2503-2:157b-9: dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed //
T02D2503-2:157b-10: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so zhes pa
T02D2503-2:157b-11: ste 'dis ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa'i las
T02D2503-2:157b-12: bstan to // da ni padmo chen po yi //
T02D2503-2:157b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas padmo'i rigs kyi phra
T02D2503-2:157b-14: mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te
T02D2503-2:157b-15: / rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-2:157b-16: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom bgoms par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:157b-17: rdo rje'i lta bas bltas na ni //
T02D2503-2:157b-19: rdo rje lta ba chags pa yis //
T02D2503-2:157b-20: dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad //
T02D2503-2:157b-21: ces sngar bshad pa ste de dang ldan pas lta ba'o //
T02D2503-2:157b-22: gang du gnas nas bya zhe na //
T02D2503-2:157b-25: padmo chen po ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas so //
T02D2503-2:157b-28: zhes bcom ldan 'das padmo'i 'dod chags kyis gsungs so zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:157b-30: 'jig rten thams cad des dga' bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:157b-31: da ni rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-2:157b-32: sogs pas nor bu'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub
T02D2503-2:157b-34: rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2503-2:157b-35: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor la gnas te'o //
T02D2503-2:157b-36: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-2:157b-37: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa goms par bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:157b-38: shin tu phra ba'i lta 'bar bas //
T02D2503-2:157b-39: zhes bya ba la 'bar ba'i lta ba ni /
T02D2503-2:157b-40: rab tu myur bar mig bsgul zhing //
T02D2503-2:157b-42: zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa ste /
T02D2503-2:157b-43: shin tu phra ba ni rab tu phra bar sbyar ba'o //
T02D2503-2:157b-46: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so zhes pa ste //
T02D2503-2:157b-47: gang gi phyir bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin de la
T02D2503-2:157b-48: gnas nas 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar na nor gang
T02D2503-2:157b-49: dang gang du 'dug pa de dang de nas rdzims
T02D2503-2:157b-50: dkris nas drangs te bkug cing gnas gang na 'dug
T02D2503-2:158a-1: pa'i gnas der 'dug par bsgom zhing lhag par mos
T02D2503-2:158a-2: pa yang de ltar byas na don ni thams cad
T02D2503-2:158a-3: 'dren par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2503-2:158a-5: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig
T02D2503-2:158a-6: gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te
T02D2503-2:158a-7: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyir gtogs pa'i
T02D2503-2:158a-8: mig gi ye shes ni mig gi rnam par shes
T02D2503-2:158a-9: / pa ste / zlos pa pos sngar bsnyen pa'i
T02D2503-2:158a-10: tshe na dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnyed pa'i mtshan
T02D2503-2:158a-11: / pa ste / nyid do // de'i dngos grub
T02D2503-2:158a-12: yin pas na mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub
T02D2503-2:158a-13: ste de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ston pa'o //
T02D2503-2:158a-14: sngar gyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang du byas
T02D2503-2:158a-15: te dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud ces bya
T02D2503-2:158a-16: ba bstan pa yin la de ltar ni ye shes
T02D2503-2:158a-17: de nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston pa yin
T02D2503-2:158a-18: no // de las kyang dang por gang gi tshe
T02D2503-2:158a-19: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D2503-2:158a-20: gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
T02D2503-2:158a-21: no // rgyud ston te / gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2503-2:158a-22: bsgrub phyir rtsol bar gyur pa na //
T02D2503-2:158a-23: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe gang gi dus
T02D2503-2:158a-24: na phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs na rtsol bar
T02D2503-2:158a-25: gyur pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa bsgrub nus pa
T02D2503-2:158a-27: de'i tshe de'i dus na nam mkha'i khams dkar por snang ba ste nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:158a-28: khams ni nam mkha'i khams na rgyu ba'i rdul phra rab ste dkar ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2503-2:158a-29: tshul ji 'dra ba zhig ce na skar ma 'dra zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-2:158a-30: de mthong na zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D2503-2:158a-31: de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2503-2:158a-32: spyan ni bdag gis 'thob par shes //
T02D2503-2:158a-33: zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis mun nag
T02D2503-2:158a-34: na 'dug ste mig phye na yang rdul phran srin
T02D2503-2:158a-35: bu me khyer lta bu nam mkha'i khams la rgyun
T02D2503-2:158a-36: mi 'chad par snang zhing gzugs thams cad kun du
T02D2503-2:158a-37: gsal bar snang ba las na des 'di ni dngos
T02D2503-2:158a-38: grub kyi mtshan ma yin no bar shes pa skye
T02D2503-2:158a-39: bar 'gyur ro // de phyin chad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2503-2:158a-40: da ni gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-2:158a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes
T02D2503-2:158a-42: kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
T02D2503-2:158a-43: gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te //

T02D2503-2:166b-37: 'dod pa kun la nyer spyod cing //

T02D2503-2:166b-40: ci 'dod pa'i gos bgo ba dang tsandan la sogs pas lus la byug pa dang /
T02D2503-2:166b-42: me tog gi phreng ba mgo la gdags pa dang /
T02D2503-2:166b-43: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2503-2:166b-44: ci snyed pa'i zas zos te stan rab tu 'dzom po la 'dug nas bsgom pa'am bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2503-2:166b-45: rab tu byung ba zhig yin na yang cho ga'i spyod pa dang mi 'gal ba'i gzugs dang /
T02D2503-2:166b-47: ro la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par mngon par 'dus byas la bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2503-2:167a-0: de ltar 'dod pa kun la nye @167a * //
T02D2503-2:167a-1: par spyod pa byas nas bdag nyid snying po'i don du bsgom la zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D2503-2:167a-2: bdag nyid bzlas par bya ba'i snying po'i don gang
T02D2503-2:167a-3: yin pa de'i 'og tu bdag nyid lhag par mos
T02D2503-2:167a-4: pas bsgom pa'o // sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun
T02D2503-2:167a-5: du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:167a-6: ni gzhag par soms shig pa'o //
T02D2503-2:167a-7: ci dga' bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni khyim
T02D2503-2:167a-8: pa zhig na khyim gyi 'tsho tshis la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:167a-9: ci 'dod pa'i las byed pa bzhin du zhes bya
T02D2503-2:167a-10: ba'i don to // rab tu byung ba zhig na
T02D2503-2:167a-11: des kyang ci 'dod pa'i las rnams byed bzhin du
T02D2503-2:167a-12: dus bzhir rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:167a-13: rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na
T02D2503-2:167a-14: zhes bya ba la rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes bya
T02D2503-2:167a-15: ba ni rdo rje tshig gi sgra spangs pa'o zhes
T02D2503-2:167a-16: gsungs pa ste / rdo rje tshig des bzlas na
T02D2503-2:167a-17: myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D2503-2:167a-18: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste mnyes par bya
T02D2503-2:167a-19: ba dang dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba la
T02D2503-2:167a-20: sogs pa dang dgos pa phran tshegs kyi las gzhan
T02D2503-2:167a-22: yang ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod
T02D2503-2:167a-23: na de'i phyir ras kyi cho ga smos te ci
T02D2503-2:167a-24: snyed pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-2:167a-25: pa bris la / de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi'i
T02D2503-2:167a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du zhes bya ba la de'i
T02D2503-2:167a-27: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i'o //
T02D2503-2:167a-28: sems dpa' chen po bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi gzung ngo //
T02D2503-2:167a-29: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du zhes bya
T02D2503-2:167a-30: ba ni phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
T02D2503-2:167a-31: so // kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar
T02D2503-2:167a-32: byas te zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi sku
T02D2503-2:167a-33: mdog dang rgyan rnams rnal 'byor ba ji ltar mos
T02D2503-2:167a-34: pa bzhin du bya ba ste /
T02D2503-2:167a-36: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2503-2:167a-38: thugs rjes non pa de dang der //
T02D2503-2:167a-39: brtse ba'i bdag nyid ston par mdzad //
T02D2503-2:167a-40: ces bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:167a-41: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2503-2:167a-42: kyi phyogs bzhir sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur
T02D2503-2:167a-43: ba bzhi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bri
T02D2503-2:167a-44: bar bya'o // rigs kyi lha mo rnams grva rnams
T02D2503-2:167a-45: su bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo
T02D2503-2:167a-47: yang na rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02D2503-2:167b-0: rdo rje srung ba @167b rnams 'khor du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:167b-1: de bzhin du gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang bcom
T02D2503-2:167b-2: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor du gyur
T02D2503-2:167b-3: pa yin no // thams cad du rigs kyi lha
T02D2503-2:167b-4: rnams de bzhin du sgrub pa po'i lha'i dbang du
T02D2503-2:167b-5: byas nas bri bar bya ste /
T02D2503-2:167b-6: mi bskyod pa zlos pa'i ni mi bskyod pa la
T02D2503-2:167b-7: sogs pa rang gi 'khor rnams kyis bskor ba bri
T02D2503-2:167b-8: bar bya zhing / thams cad du yang rigs kyi
T02D2503-2:167b-9: lha rnams de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
T02D2503-2:167b-10: du gyur ba'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi yang dkyil
T02D2503-2:167b-11: 'khor gyi tshul du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-2:167b-12: de ltar ras kyi cho ga zin par byas nas
T02D2503-2:167b-13: de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya
T02D2503-2:167b-14: cher byas la bzlas pa bya ba'i tshul ji lta
T02D2503-2:167b-15: ba bzhin du zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i dus
T02D2503-2:167b-16: bzhir me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba
T02D2503-2:167b-17: dang / gnas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas
T02D2503-2:167b-18: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o zhes ston
T02D2503-2:167b-19: dang / to // zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzla
T02D2503-2:167b-20: bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji srid zla ba
T02D2503-2:167b-21: bzhi lon pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par
T02D2503-2:167b-22: bya ba ste 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus
T02D2503-2:167b-23: dang / to // kyi nges pa'o // de nas
T02D2503-2:167b-24: mthar mchod pa rgya chen po byas la mtshan thog
T02D2503-2:167b-26: de nas nam langs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2503-2:167b-27: de ltar grub pa chen po bshad zin nas /
T02D2503-2:167b-28: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ston te /
T02D2503-2:167b-30: phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni /
T02D2503-2:167b-31: zhes bya ba ni zlos pa po des de bzhin
T02D2503-2:167b-32: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i
T02D2503-2:167b-33: phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba la de bzhin
T02D2503-2:167b-34: gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2503-2:167b-36: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes
T02D2503-2:167b-37: pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje ma smos pas ni sems
T02D2503-2:167b-38: dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya gzung ngo //
T02D2503-2:167b-39: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi
T02D2503-2:167b-40: gang dang gang bsgrub par 'dod pa des de bcing
T02D2503-2:167b-41: bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:167b-42: de bas na des sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag
T02D2503-2:167b-43: rgya de bcings la sngon du bya ba thams cad
T02D2503-2:167b-44: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du byas nas ri mo'i
T02D2503-2:167b-45: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin ji
T02D2503-2:167b-46: lta ba bzhin du bcings shing bkrol te /
T02D2503-2:168a-0: rdo rje'i tshig gis 'bum bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba la ci dga' ba bzhin @168a * //
T02D2503-2:168a-1: du zhes bya ba ni khyim pa zhig na khyim gyi bya ba byed pa dang /
T02D2503-2:168a-2: rab tu byung ba zhig na rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byed bzhin du'o //
T02D2503-2:168a-3: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni me tog
T02D2503-2:168a-4: dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas te
T02D2503-2:168a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D2503-2:168a-6: bcings zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'i tshe'o //
T02D2503-2:168a-7: bgro ba krol zhes bya ba ni ldang ba'i tshe'o //
T02D2503-2:168a-8: rdo rje tshig gis zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis so //
T02D2503-2:168a-9: 'bum bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni stong phrag brgya ni 'bum mo //
T02D2503-2:168a-10: de ltar stong phrag brgyar brtsis pa bzlas nas lag
T02D2503-2:168a-11: pa gnyis kas phyag rgya bcings te sems kyis dkyil
T02D2503-2:168a-12: 'khor bris la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2503-2:168a-13: nas brtsams te sgo ba rnams la thug gi bar
T02D2503-2:168a-14: du sems dpa' re re nas mngon sum du bya
T02D2503-2:168a-16: de lta bu lan gsum bskor ba dang brgya rtsa
T02D2503-2:168a-17: brgyad lhag pa dang bcas pa bzlas par gyur te
T02D2503-2:168a-19: de nas mthar mchod pa ci nus byas la mtshan
T02D2503-2:168a-20: thog thag tu bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar
T02D2503-2:168a-21: ro // 'bum bzlas pa'i mthar ngal bar gyur na
T02D2503-2:168a-22: cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol la ji lta
T02D2503-2:168a-23: ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba la ji
T02D2503-2:168a-24: lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid
T02D2503-2:168a-25: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya chen po mngon
T02D2503-2:168a-26: sum du byas la snying po brjod cing lce la
T02D2503-2:168a-27: rdo rje bsams te bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2503-2:168a-28: de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing
T02D2503-2:168a-29: smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dngos grub
T02D2503-2:168a-31: phyag rgya bcings pa de 'bar ram 'phar ba'i mtshan ma byung na dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:168a-32: babs na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba ste
T02D2503-2:168a-33: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nas brtsams te sems can thams
T02D2503-2:168a-34: cad kyi gzugs su ston pa'i bar du 'gyur te
T02D2503-2:168a-35: / phyag rgya bcings la gang gi gzugs su bya
T02D2503-2:168a-36: bar 'dod pa de'i gzugs su bdag nyid yin par
T02D2503-2:168a-37: / bsams na / de'i tshe bdag nyid lha'i gzugs
T02D2503-2:168a-38: yin par bdag nyid kyis kyang mthong zhing gzhan la
T02D2503-2:168a-39: yang ston pas na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur
T02D2503-2:168a-40: / bsams na / ba yin no // phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:168a-41: bsgrub pa'i dus su 'phar bar gyur na mi snang
T02D2503-2:168a-42: ba'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i ltas yin te /
T02D2503-2:168a-43: de yang phyag rgya thog mar de bcings la lus
T02D2503-2:168a-44: rdul phra rab tu rnam par bshig cing bsgoms nas
T02D2503-2:168a-45: bdag ni nam mkha'o zhes bsgoms na ji srid nam
T02D2503-2:168a-46: mkha' sgom pa de srid pha rol gyis mi mthong
T02D2503-2:168b-0: bar 'gyur ro // phyag rgya bsgrub @168b pa'i dus
T02D2503-2:168b-1: su smra bar 'gyur bas ni 'bab pa dang bcing
T02D2503-2:168b-2: bar 'gyur ro // ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2503-2:168b-3: gdon rnams tshar gcod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-2:168b-4: bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis las
T02D2503-2:168b-5: thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur
T02D2503-2:168b-6: ro zhes bya ba ni dngos grub rnam pa bzhi
T02D2503-2:168b-7: char gyi las kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T02D2503-2:168b-8: gang gi phyir 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2503-2:168b-9: yin pa'i phyir de grub na dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-2:168b-10: rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad ji
T02D2503-2:168b-11: lta ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur te /
T02D2503-2:168b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mtshan
T02D2503-2:168b-13: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad byed do
T02D2503-2:168b-14: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so
T02D2503-2:168b-15: // da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ston te /
T02D2503-2:168b-16: de nas ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na zhes
T02D2503-2:168b-17: bya ba la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes
T02D2503-2:168b-18: thogs la ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rjes la
T02D2503-2:168b-19: chos kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:168b-20: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa ste de
T02D2503-2:168b-21: yang chos kyi phyag rgya yin la ting nge 'dzin
T02D2503-2:168b-22: de rnams kyang rnam pa mang bas gal te rnal
T02D2503-2:168b-23: 'byor pas de bsgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo
T02D2503-2:168b-24: rje phra mo nas brtsams te zhes bya ba rdo
T02D2503-2:168b-25: rje phra mo bsgom pa goms par byas pas dang
T02D2503-2:168b-26: por sems brtan par byas te'o //
T02D2503-2:168b-27: ting nge 'dzin gang dga' ba zhes bya ba ni byams pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2503-2:168b-28: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po sngar bstan pa rnams so //
T02D2503-2:168b-29: de'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba
T02D2503-2:168b-30: bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la zhes bya ba la de
T02D2503-2:168b-31: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2503-2:168b-32: snying po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni snying po'i don la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:168b-33: zla ba bzhi'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dus
T02D2503-2:168b-34: kyi nges pa ston pa ste de dang por sems
T02D2503-2:168b-35: brtan par byas zin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-2:168b-36: bsgoms la zhes bya ba ni goms par byas pa'o //
T02D2503-2:168b-37: de nas mthar thog thag skyil mo krung mi bshig
T02D2503-2:168b-38: par / snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o zhes
T02D2503-2:168b-39: bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gang 'dis zla ba
T02D2503-2:168b-40: bzhi'i bar du bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bsgoms
T02D2503-2:168b-41: nas de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-2:168b-42: pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum
T02D2503-2:168b-44: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
T02D2503-2:169a-0: @169a * // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de'i stobs kyis deng
T02D2503-2:169a-1: gtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams cad kyang mngon
T02D2503-2:169a-3: de ltar mngon sum du gyur pa dang de nas
T02D2503-2:169a-4: ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'thob par
T02D2503-2:169a-5: 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2503-2:169a-7: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ston te /
T02D2503-2:169a-8: de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar
T02D2503-2:169a-9: du bsgrubs la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra
T02D2503-2:169a-10: mo bsgom pa goms par byas te /
T02D2503-2:169a-11: phyag bzhi byas nas me tog dang //
T02D2503-2:169a-12: dri la sogs pas dus bzhir mchod pa dang /
T02D2503-2:169a-13: rdo rje tshig gis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D2503-2:169a-14: zla ba gcig gi bar du de ltar bsgrubs pa'i
T02D2503-2:169a-15: mjug tu de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu
T02D2503-2:169a-16: bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dkyil
T02D2503-2:169a-17: 'khor bris la mchod pa ci nus pa bya'o //
T02D2503-2:169a-18: de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D2503-2:169a-19: ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
T02D2503-2:169a-20: so zhes pa'o // da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs bas las ston te /
T02D2503-2:169a-21: lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag bsrung ba ni
T02D2503-2:169a-22: go cha bcing ba zhes 'og nas ston ba dang
T02D2503-2:169a-23: sbyar ro // de bzhin du gzhan bsrung ba dang
T02D2503-2:169a-24: grong dang grong khyer bsrung ba ni go cha chen
T02D2503-2:169a-25: po bcing ba la sogs pas so //
T02D2503-2:169a-26: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02D2503-2:169a-27: mtshams bcing ba dang sa bcing ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D2503-2:169a-28: dbab pa yang tsandan dri zhim pos zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:169a-29: la dri 'phel ni bar da na zhes bya ba'i
T02D2503-2:169a-30: tsandan te de ba dar bas lag pa bsku zhing
T02D2503-2:169a-31: snod kyi khar yang bzhag la de nyid chu'i nang
T02D2503-2:169a-32: du blugs pa'i chu snod kyi khar brdeg pa dang
T02D2503-2:169a-33: / de nyid kyis bdug pa bya ste de ltar na 'bab par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2503-2:169a-34: gdon gyis zin pa dang gdon gyis ma zin pa
T02D2503-2:169a-35: zhes bya ba la zin pa ni rims la sogs
T02D2503-2:169a-36: pas thebs pa'o // ma zin pa ni tha ma la pa'o //
T02D2503-2:169a-37: da ni rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya dbab pa ston te /
T02D2503-2:169a-38: bcings na byas pa'am blugs pa'i dngos po thams cad
T02D2503-2:169a-39: la rdo rje la sogs pa 'bab par 'gyur ro
T02D2503-2:169a-40: // babs nas bum pa la sogs pa nor stor ba la sogs pa'i gnas su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2503-2:169a-41: bum pa la sogs pa phyag rgya'i rang gi las rnams byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:169a-42: gal te sgyur ma'i las kyang byed par 'dod na
T02D2503-2:169a-43: rna bya'i mjug ma'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste
T02D2503-2:169a-44: bcings la / de nas rma bya'i mjug ma de
T02D2503-2:169a-45: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas ma nan la
T02D2503-2:169b-0: de bzhin @169b gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'
T02D2503-2:169b-1: rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bab kyi bar du bzlas
T02D2503-2:169b-2: pa bya'o zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2503-2:169b-3: thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni sems dpa' rdo rje
T02D2503-2:169b-4: bcings la / ma'i phyag rgya'o // phyag rgya bab
T02D2503-2:169b-5: pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma
T02D2503-2:169b-6: bcings la / ma'i phyag rgya'o // ste / gnyis
T02D2503-2:169b-7: pa ni de nas rma bya'i mjug ma las gzugs

T02D2503-2:169b-30: zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta bu yin pa

T02D2503-2:171a-18: de bzhin du rdo rje bdug pa mal sogs pa'i

T02D2503-2:175a-11: rin po che'i phyag rgyas dang po nyid du bdag
T02D2503-2:175a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i

T02D2503-2:200b-30: gcod par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas mtshon no //
T02D2503-2:200b-31: mi phyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na rdo rje rgyu'o //
T02D2503-2:200b-32: spros pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor thams cad la khyad bas na 'khor lo che'o //
T02D2503-2:200b-33: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin yin bas na sangs rgyas 'khor lo'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-1: cad kyi gter du gyur pas na gter chen po'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad sdud pa la 'jug par mdzad pas na dkyil 'khor kun no //
T02D2503-2:201a-3: sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog yin pas na chos mchog go //
T02D2503-2:201a-4: sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin
T02D2503-2:201a-5: pas na chos kyi 'khor lo yin pa'i phyir ram
T02D2503-2:201a-6: 'khor lo'i rgyur gyur pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o
T02D2503-2:201a-7: // thogs pa med pa'i gsung mnga' bas na rdo rje gsungs ngo //
T02D2503-2:201a-8: phyogs thams cad khyab pa'i gsung mnga' bas na gsung ba che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-9: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas na spros med do //
T02D2503-2:201a-10: yi ge chen po mnga' bas na yi ge che ste sgra rnams nyid yin no //
T02D2503-2:201a-11: don dam par 'di la 'gyur ba med pas na
T02D2503-2:201a-12: yi ge med pa ste dam pa'i yi ge che
T02D2503-2:201a-14: tshad med pa'i bzlas pa mnga' bas na bzlas pa che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-15: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mnga' bas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
T02D2503-2:201a-16: mi phyed pa'i phrin las mnga' bas na rdo rje las so ;
T02D2503-2:201a-17: / las bzang bo rnams kyi nang na yang mchod
T02D2503-2:201a-18: pa'i las mchog yin pas na las rab mchog go
T02D2503-2:201a-19: // mchod pa'i las kyis thams cad du khyab par mdzad pas na las chen no //
T02D2503-2:201a-20: bzang po'i las rnams mdzad pas na las rab byed pa'o //

T02D2503-2:201a-22: mchod pa'i las kyi khyad par mang po mnga' bas na mchod pa che'o //

T02D2503-2:201a-24: mi phyed pa'i srung ba yin pas na rdo rje srung ba'o //

T02D2503-2:201a-27: mi phyed pa'i chos can yin pas na brtan pa che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-28: sems can gyi tshogs tshad med pa yang dag par srung bar mdzad pas na srung ba che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-29: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na snying rje che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-30: sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i rang
T02D2503-2:201a-31: bzhin can yin pas na sangs rgyas brtson 'grus so
T02D2503-2:201a-32: // mi phyed pas na rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2503-2:201a-33: spros pa'i dus na thams cad du khyab pas na khro ba che'o //
T02D2503-2:201a-34: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su ston pas na ma rungs pa thams cad do //
T02D2503-2:201b-0: sems @201b can thams cad 'jigs pa skyed par byed pas na skrag par byed pa'o //
T02D2503-2:201b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
T02D2503-2:201b-2: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs kyi mchog yin pas na thabs chen no //
T02D2503-2:201b-3: thams cad la 'khor bo'i gzugs su ston pas na srung ba mchog go //
T02D2503-2:201b-4: mi phyed pa'i khu tshur yin pas na rdo rje bsdus pa'o //
T02D2503-2:201b-5: phyag rgya thams cad dam spros pa'i dus na 'jig
T02D2503-2:201b-6: rten gyi khams cad khyab pas na phyag rgya che'o
T02D2503-2:201b-7: // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D2503-2:201b-8: rnams kyi dam tshig yin pas na dam tshig chen
T02D2503-2:201b-9: // po'o ; / sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
T02D2503-2:201b-10: gi sbyor bas thams cad 'ching bar mdzad pas na
T02D2503-2:201b-11: // po'o ; 'ching ba che'o // ye shes mchog
T02D2503-2:201b-12: bsdus pa'i khu tshur yin pas na khu tshur chen
T02D2503-2:201b-14: rgya thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur bas na phyag

T02D2503-2:201b-19: mchog go // tshur ro // de bzhin gshegs pas

T02D2503-2:201b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-2:201b-23: las 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2503-2:201b-24: par bstod pa'i sgo nas mjug bsdus pa bzlas te
T02D2503-2:201b-26: yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //

T02D2503-2:201b-28: ba bstan pa dang phan yon bstan pa yin no

T02D2503-2:201b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkar bsgrub cing 'di bshad pa'i
T02D2503-2:201b-32: don la dgyes pa'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2503-2:201b-33: rnams gcig tu 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba
T02D2503-2:201b-35: 'di dag gi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2503-2:201b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
T02D2503-2:201b-37: dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2503-2:201b-38: snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
T02D2503-2:201b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgyes pa ni mnyes pa'o //
T02D2503-2:201b-40: de ltar dgyes nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2503-2:201b-41: rang gi thugs la zhugs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-2:201b-42: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mnyes par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-2:202a-0: yon tan mang ldan dad pa mchog gi gnas gyur go ta @202a * //
T02D2503-2:202a-2: dge zhing tshul mang legs pa rgya mtsho dang ldan gtsug lag khang mchog de //
T02D2503-2:202a-3: dpal ldan bde byed kyis byas shin tu yid 'ong mkhas pa rnams kyi gnas gyur cing //
T02D2503-2:202a-4: rgyal po'i dpa' bo chos kyi bdag nyid dpal gyis kha ba bzhin bsil der gnas tshe ;
T02D2503-2:202a-5: / dang por grogs mchog gnas brtan dbang po'i go cha'i tshig gis gsol ba btab pa dang //
T02D2503-2:202a-6: shes rab lha yi mkhas bcas brtson pa'i stobs sogs gtso bor byas la brtan pa dang //
T02D2503-2:202a-7: bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs dbang song mthong ba dang //

T02D2503-2:202a-9: de phyir nges don shin tu rnam 'byed tshig don gsal zhing kun gyi thun mong ba'i //
T02D2503-2:202a-10: rgya cher bshad 'di 'gro ba'i don kun grub phyir sh'akya mi rtas sa steng brtsams //
T02D2503-2:202a-11: nges sbyar 'dis ni 'jig rten ma lus rnam dag blo gros yang dag thob nas ni //
